analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni //

analyzed: 'dod pas thams cad kun spangs pas //

original: grub par byed pa'i gegs su che //
analyzed: grub par byed pa'i gegs su che //
translated: it is a great hindrance to accomplishment.

original: 'dod pa'i ting 'dzin bag chags des //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i ting 'dzin bag chags des //

original: bag chags des ni sems 'dzin yin //
analyzed: bag chags des ni sems 'dzin yin //
translated: is the latent tendency that grasps the mind.

original: 'dzin pas bde ba de spong byed //
analyzed: 'dzin pas bde ba de spong byed //

original: mi 'dzin bde ba kun len pas //
analyzed: mi 'dzin bde ba kun len pas //
translated: since non-grasping takes up all bliss,

original: ji bzhin pa yi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa yi rang bzhin no //
translated: it is the nature just as it is.

original: ji bzhin bcos pa med pa de //
analyzed: ji bzhin bcos pa med pa de //
translated: That just as it is, without fabrication,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa gcig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa gcig /

original: bde ba che las ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: bde ba che las ma gtogs pa //
translated: Apart from great bliss,

analyzed: 'dod dang 'dzin pa ga la yod // mi gnas pa la dmigs pa med //
translated: how can there be desire and grasping?üîΩThere is no reference point in nonabiding.

original: mi rtog pa la 'dzin pa med //
analyzed: mi rtog pa la 'dzin pa med //
translated: There is no grasping in nonconceptuality.

original: med pa don gyi snying po de //
analyzed: med pa don gyi snying po de //
translated: The ultimate heart essence that does not exist

original: 'dod pa med pas thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dod pa med pas thob par 'gyur //
translated: is attained because there is no desire.

original: gang la 'dzin chags med pa des //
analyzed: gang la 'dzin chags med pa des //
translated: That which is free of attachment

original: ting nge 'dzin te 'dzin pa'i mchog /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin te 'dzin pa'i mchog /
translated: is samƒÅdhi, the supreme grasping.

original: kun zin ye nas grub zin pas //
analyzed: kun zin ye nas grub zin pas //
translated: Since everything is already included and already accomplished,

original: btang gzhag mi rtog grub @85b pa'i rgyal //
analyzed: btang gzhag mi rtog grub @85b pa'i rgyal //
translated: the king of accomplishment is nonconceptual letting go.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: sna tshogs bsgoms pas gcig mi gsal //
analyzed: sna tshogs bsgoms pas gcig mi gsal //
translated: the one thing is not clarified by meditating on variety.

original: gsal ba ting 'dzin gang byed pa //
analyzed: gsal ba ting 'dzin gang byed pa //
translated: Whatever samƒÅdhi is created

original: de la'ang ting 'dzin yod ma yin //
analyzed: de la'ang ting 'dzin yod ma yin //
translated: also does not exist as samƒÅdhi.

original: de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la //
translated: In the same way, the one thing

original: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su phye //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su phye //

original: bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis phye nas //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis phye nas //

original: bde ba dang du blang lung bstan //
analyzed: bde ba dang du blang lung bstan //
translated: the teaching is to adopt happiness.

original: sdig pa rgyab tu bor lung bstan //
analyzed: sdig pa rgyab tu bor lung bstan //

original: de ni nges pa'i lung dang 'gal //
analyzed: de ni nges pa'i lung dang 'gal //
translated: That contradicts the definitive scriptures.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: gcig la gnyis su ma 'byed cig /
analyzed: gcig la gnyis su ma 'byed cig /
translated: do not divide the one into two.

original: bde ba sdug bsngal byang chub gcig /
analyzed: bde ba sdug bsngal byang chub gcig /

original: sangs rgyas sems can sems su gcig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can sems su gcig /

original: snang srid snod bcud chos nyid gcig /
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud chos nyid gcig /
translated: The world of appearances and possibilities and the animate and inanimate universe are one in dharmata.

original: bden brdzun gnyis kyang chos nyid mnyam //
analyzed: bden brdzun gnyis kyang chos nyid mnyam //

original: bde ba ma len sdug ma spong //
analyzed: bde ba ma len sdug ma spong //

original: rang bzhin gnas pas kun kyang 'grub //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnas pas kun kyang 'grub //

original: bde la chags pa sdug bsngal yin //
analyzed: bde la chags pa sdug bsngal yin //

original: kun gsal de la rtog med pas //
analyzed: kun gsal de la rtog med pas //

original: de ni rang 'byung ye shes yin //
analyzed: de ni rang 'byung ye shes yin //
translated: this is naturally occurring timeless awareness.

original: ye shes bag chags mi gsog pas //
analyzed: ye shes bag chags mi gsog pas //

original: las kyis gos par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: las kyis gos par ga la 'gyur //

original: rgyu 'bras ye shes ting 'dzin rtog /
analyzed: rgyu 'bras ye shes ting 'dzin rtog /

original: rtog pa'i ye shes bag chags can //
analyzed: rtog pa'i ye shes bag chags can //

original: ye shes bag chags dbang bsgyur bas //
analyzed: ye shes bag chags dbang bsgyur bas //
translated: Since timeless awareness is subject to the influence of habitual patterns,

original: rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom mi bya //
analyzed: rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom mi bya //
translated: do not cultivate the timeless awareness of conceptual mind.

original: rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom byas pas //
analyzed: rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom byas pas //
translated: If you do cultivate the timeless awareness of conceptual mind,

original: mi rtog mnyam dang bral bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtog mnyam dang bral bar 'gyur //
translated: you will be divorced from the state of equalness, which is nonconceptual.

original: ting 'dzin rtsol ba'i nad kyis zin //
analyzed: ting 'dzin rtsol ba'i nad kyis zin //
translated: You will be seized by the malady of striving in meditative absorption.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: kun byed nga ni byang chub sems /üîΩ@86a *// thams cad byang chub sems yin la //
analyzed: kun byed nga ni byang chub sems / @86a *// thams cad byang chub sems yin la //
translated: I, the all-creating one, am awakened mind.üîΩEverything is awakened mind.

original: byang chub sems las thams cad med //
analyzed: byang chub sems las thams cad med //

original: sems las sprul pa'i chos ni sna tshogs te //
analyzed: sems las sprul pa'i chos ni sna tshogs te //

original: sna tshogs sprul pa cir yang snang ba ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs sprul pa cir yang snang ba ni //
translated: manifest in all their variety.üîΩBeings, with their various forms, shapes, and colors,

original: sems can gzugs dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang // ji ltar snang ba de la dad pa re //
analyzed: sems can gzugs dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang // ji ltar snang ba de la dad pa re //

original: dad pa de yis 'thad pa'i chos ston pa //
analyzed: dad pa de yis 'thad pa'i chos ston pa //
translated: The teachings that accord with that faith

original: de ni ye shes thugs rje sprul par bshad //
analyzed: de ni ye shes thugs rje sprul par bshad //

original: de yang rang bzhin chos la g-yos pa med //
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin chos la g-yos pa med //

original: sangs rgyas rang bzhin chos la g-yos med pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rang bzhin chos la g-yos med pas //
translated: The nature of buddhas does not waver.

original: dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi chos nyid yin //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi chos nyid yin //

original: chos nyid las ni sangs rgyas gud na med //üîΩsangs rgyas las ni sems can gud na med //
analyzed: chos nyid las ni sangs rgyas gud na med // sangs rgyas las ni sems can gud na med //
translated: Buddhas are not to be found apart from this nature.üîΩSentient beings are not to be found apart from buddhas.

original: sems can mi rtogs sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin //
analyzed: sems can mi rtogs sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin //
translated: The enlightened intent of buddhas is not to conceptualize sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems ma byung gi bar du ni //
analyzed: byang chub sems ma byung gi bar du ni //
translated: Until awakened mind has emerged,

original: sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis ka med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis ka med //

original: de bas sangs rgyas kun pas sems nyid bsngags //
analyzed: de bas sangs rgyas kun pas sems nyid bsngags //

original: sems nyid mi 'gyur 'gyur ba ye nas med //
analyzed: sems nyid mi 'gyur 'gyur ba ye nas med //

original: chos nyid bsgyur bas g-yos pa rdul med par //
analyzed: chos nyid bsgyur bas g-yos pa rdul med par //
translated: The nature of phenomena is unmoving, without a particle‚Äôs stirring.

original: gcig la rim pa dgu dang brgyad khri stong //
analyzed: gcig la rim pa dgu dang brgyad khri stong //
translated: In one, there are nine levels and eighty-four thousand distinctions.

original: 'byed pa'i ston pas gcig gi don mi rtogs //
analyzed: 'byed pa'i ston pas gcig gi don mi rtogs //
translated: The teacher who distinguishes them does not realize the meaning of one.

original: gcig ma rtogs pas kun don rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gcig ma rtogs pas kun don rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: Since one is not realized, all meanings are not realized.

original: des na sems gcig don de rab tu rtogs //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na sems gcig don de rab tu rtogs // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, thoroughly realize the meaning of the one mind.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po @86b las; ma g-yos 'dod pa med pa'i le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po @86b las; ma g-yos 'dod pa med pa'i le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This is the thirty-second chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the one meaning of the Great Perfection.üîΩCHAPTER THIRTY-THREEüîΩThe Explanation of the Unmoving, Uncontrived Nature of MindüîΩThen the all-creating monarch, bodhichitta, taught that all phenomena are unmoving.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad g-yos pa med pa 'di gsungs so; ;kye; sems dpa' chen po nga rtogs shig /
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad g-yos pa med pa 'di gsungs so; ;kye; sems dpa' chen po nga rtogs shig /
translated: ‚ÄúOh great and courageous one, realize me!

original: nga rtogs chos rtogs g-yos pa med //
analyzed: nga rtogs chos rtogs g-yos pa med //
translated: Realizing me, phenomena are realized as unmoving.

original: kun byed rgyal po ston pa nga nyid ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po ston pa nga nyid ni //
translated: I, the teacher, the all-creating monarch,

original: byang chub sems la g-yos pa med pa de //üîΩthams cad byang chub sems las g-yos med cing //
analyzed: byang chub sems la g-yos pa med pa de // thams cad byang chub sems las g-yos med cing //
translated: does not waver from bodhicitta.

original: rang 'byung ye shes rgyu rkyen med pa de //üîΩrgyu dang 'bras bu kun las shin tu rgyal //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes rgyu rkyen med pa de // rgyu dang 'bras bu kun las shin tu rgyal //
translated: Self-originated pristine consciousness is free from causes and conditions.üîΩIt is utterly victorious over all causes and results.

original: rgyu 'bras theg pa can la shin tu gsang //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras theg pa can la shin tu gsang //
translated: It is utterly secret from those who have the vehicle of causes and results.

original: ma skyes rdo rje chos kyi dbyings na rgyal //
analyzed: ma skyes rdo rje chos kyi dbyings na rgyal //
translated: The unborn vajra is victorious in the dhatu of phenomena.

original: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
translated: It is utterly secret; do not speak of it to those who have causes and results.

original: sems nyid ma 'gags nam mkha'i dbyings na rgyal //
analyzed: sems nyid ma 'gags nam mkha'i dbyings na rgyal //
translated: The unceasing mind itself is victorious in the realm of space.

original: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
translated: It is utterly secret; do not speak of it to those who have causes and results.

original: snang srid snod bcud ma bcos chos nyid rgyal //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud ma bcos chos nyid rgyal //
translated: The unfabricated dharmata of the world and its beings is victorious.

original: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
translated: It is utterly secret; do not speak of it to those who have causes and results.

original: nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga //
analyzed: nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga //
translated: The five appearances of space, air, water, earth, and fire

original: byang chub sems kyi ngo bor shin tu rgyal //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi ngo bor shin tu rgyal //
translated: are utterly victorious in the essence of bodhicitta.

original: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
translated: It is utterly secret; do not speak of it to those who have causes and results.

original: khams gsum dus gsum thugs rje ye shes rgyal //
analyzed: khams gsum dus gsum thugs rje ye shes rgyal //
translated: Compassionate pristine consciousness is victorious in the three realms and three times.

original: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang //
translated: It is utterly secret; do not speak of it to those who have causes and results.

original: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin kun byed la //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin kun byed la //
translated: The nature of awakened mind is all-creating.

original: ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin zhi ba med //
analyzed: ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin zhi ba med //
translated: It does not fade, is not at peace, and is not by nature at peace.

original: chos dbyings rang bzhin spros med zhi ba med //
analyzed: chos dbyings rang bzhin spros med zhi ba med //

original: ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin spros pa med //
analyzed: ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin spros pa med //
translated: It does not fade, is not at peace, and is by nature free of elaboration.

original: rang 'byung ye shes ma @87a *//
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes ma @87a *//
translated: Naturally occurring timeless awareness,

original: bsgribs gsal ba de //
analyzed: bsgribs gsal ba de //
translated: unobscured and lucid,

original: mkha' la ma yal ma zhi zhi ba med //
analyzed: mkha' la ma yal ma zhi zhi ba med //
translated: is not at peace in the sky, does not fade, and is not at peace.

original: snang srid snod bcud chos nyid rang bzhin te //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud chos nyid rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of the world of appearances and possibilities, the entire universe, is such thatüîΩit does not fade, is not at peace, and is by nature not at peace.

original: ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin zhi ba med; ;chos rnams thams cad ma yal ma zhi ba //
analyzed: ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin zhi ba med; ;chos rnams thams cad ma yal ma zhi ba //
translated: All phenomena, without exception, do not fade and are not at peace.

original: rang bzhin gsal te ngo bo g-yos pa med //
analyzed: rang bzhin gsal te ngo bo g-yos pa med //
translated: Their nature is lucidity, and their essence is unwavering.

original: g-yos med chos la rgyu 'bras sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: g-yos med chos la rgyu 'bras sgrub byed pa //
translated: Those who strive to achieve causality in this unwavering context

original: de ni nga yi lung min 'dod lung yin //
analyzed: de ni nga yi lung min 'dod lung yin //
translated: are not following my transmission; they are following their own ideas.

original: nga ni 'dod pa med pas kun grub ste //
analyzed: nga ni 'dod pa med pas kun grub ste //
translated: Since I have no ideas, everything is ensured.

original: mi 'dod 'dod pa med par rang bzhin 'grub //
analyzed: mi 'dod 'dod pa med par rang bzhin 'grub //

original: grub ces bya ba nga yis smras pa med //
analyzed: grub ces bya ba nga yis smras pa med //
translated: I do not say that anything is ‚Äúensured.‚Äù

original: rgyu 'bras grub 'dod rnams kyi tshig tu'o //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras grub 'dod rnams kyi tshig tu'o //
translated: This is the statement of those who believe in the achievement of causality.

original: nga ni sgro dang skur ba'i sgra ru che //
analyzed: nga ni sgro dang skur ba'i sgra ru che //
translated: I am the great sound of superimposition and denial.üîΩExistence and nonexistence, establishment and nonestablishment,

original: yod dang med dang grub dang ma grub dang // sgro dang skur pa btab pa thams cad kun //
analyzed: yod dang med dang grub dang ma grub dang // sgro dang skur pa btab pa thams cad kun //
translated: All superimpositions and denials

original: mi rtog pas ni mnyam pa nyid du gnas //
analyzed: mi rtog pas ni mnyam pa nyid du gnas //
translated: Abide in equality through nonconceptuality.

original: mnyam pa nyid las ma gtogs gzhan pa ni //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid las ma gtogs gzhan pa ni //
translated: Other than equality,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ngas ma gsungs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ngas ma gsungs //
translated: I, the grandfather of all buddhas, do not teach.

original: ma gsungs dgongs pa sangs rgyas kun mi ston //
analyzed: ma gsungs dgongs pa sangs rgyas kun mi ston //
translated: The transcendent state of what is not taught is not shown to all buddhas.

original: gsungs pa thams cad nga yi ngo bo gsungs //
analyzed: gsungs pa thams cad nga yi ngo bo gsungs //
translated: All that is taught is taught to be my essence.

original: ngo bo rang bzhin chos rnams thams cad yin //
analyzed: ngo bo rang bzhin chos rnams thams cad yin //
translated: The essence is the nature of all phenomena.

original: rang bzhin rnam dag mnyam pa'i rgyal po de //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnam dag mnyam pa'i rgyal po de //

original: mi 'gyur rang bzhin chags pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: mi 'gyur rang bzhin chags pa kun dang bral //

original: gzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med //
analyzed: gzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med //

original: de la mngon sum thob par su 'dod pa //
analyzed: de la mngon sum thob par su 'dod pa //
translated: Whoever desires to attain direct perception

original: 'dod pa de ni chags pa'i gnas yin te //
analyzed: 'dod pa de ni chags pa'i gnas yin te //
translated: In that desire, there is a location of attachment.

original: @87b de la mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa de //
analyzed: @87b de la mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa de //
translated: The transcendent state of uniform nonconceptuality

original: chos nyid ye nas rang bzhin gnas pa la //
analyzed: chos nyid ye nas rang bzhin gnas pa la //
translated: Is the dharmatƒÅ that has always been naturally abiding.

original: de btsal bsam pas 'dod sgrub byed pa ni //
analyzed: de btsal bsam pas 'dod sgrub byed pa ni //
translated: To seek it by thinking is to make the wish-fulfilling gem

original: rang sems gzhan du tshol bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: rang sems gzhan du tshol bar byed pa yin //
translated: a thing to be sought elsewhere than in one‚Äôs own mind.

original: de yis chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams //
analyzed: de yis chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams //
translated: It destroys the dharmadhatu and the realm of space,

original: khams gsum gnas dang srid pa'i chos bshig kyang //
analyzed: khams gsum gnas dang srid pa'i chos bshig kyang //
translated: the three worlds and the phenomena of existence,

original: rang sems rang bzhin gnas pa de mi rnyed //
analyzed: rang sems rang bzhin gnas pa de mi rnyed //
translated: but it does not find the mind that is by nature at rest.

original: rang gi sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: rang gi sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
translated: One‚Äôs own mind is of the nature of space.

original: mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med //
analyzed: mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med //
translated: Since it has no limits, the expanse of reality is not diminished.

original: rang sems nam mkha' rang bzhin de mi rig /
analyzed: rang sems nam mkha' rang bzhin de mi rig /
translated: Not knowing that the nature of one‚Äôs mind is space,

original: chos kyi rang bzhin kun kyang de lta ste //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin kun kyang de lta ste //
translated: one thinks that the nature of phenomena is the same.

original: ji bzhin pa la kun kyang bcos pa med //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa la kun kyang bcos pa med //
translated: But in reality, nothing is to be contrived.

original: 'chos pa rol pa'i ting 'dzin ci byas kyang //
analyzed: 'chos pa rol pa'i ting 'dzin ci byas kyang //
translated: Whatever one does in the samadhi of the play of contrivance,

original: ji bzhin pa la ngo bo 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa la ngo bo 'gyur ba med //
translated: the essence of reality is not changed.

original: 'gyur te lhag pa'i stobs gcig che 'gyur na //
analyzed: 'gyur te lhag pa'i stobs gcig che 'gyur na //
translated: If one changes, the one great power

original: ting 'dzin gcig gis 'khor ba lhag ma med //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gcig gis 'khor ba lhag ma med //
translated: will be the samadhi that leaves no remainder of samsara.

original: smra yang ji bzhin pa la 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: smra yang ji bzhin pa la 'gyur ba med //
translated: One may speak, but the nature of things is not changed.

original: rang bzhin che ba'i yul la rang bzhin gnas //

analyzed: ma btsal lhun gyis grub par yid kyang ches //

analyzed: sems las sems sprul sems kyi don mdzad @91a *//

analyzed: spong 'gegs yul can dag la ming mi grag /

analyzed: byang chub yan lag kun gyi sgor zhugs nas; ;cho ga rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin rim pa yis //

analyzed: stong phrag gcig na mi rtog mnyam bzod rnyed //

analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyid kyang //

analyzed: nga lung ma nor khyod kyis nga ston cig /

analyzed: kye; sems can lha mi rnams ni shes pa rtsing //

analyzed: rtogs pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o ////
translated: This is the eighty-first chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, the tantra of the mind of perfect purity.üîΩChapter 82: The View

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lta ba bsgom du med ba rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lta ba bsgom du med ba rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, spoke these words:

original: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da rtogs shig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da rtogs shig /
translated: ‚ÄúO fearless one, understand this perfectly!

original: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba kun byed la //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba kun byed la //
translated: The all-creating heart essence of enlightenment, the source of all phenomena,

original: lta dang blta bar bya ba yod ma yin //üîΩgang la gang ltar snying po @95a *//
analyzed: lta dang blta bar bya ba yod ma yin // gang la gang ltar snying po @95a *//
translated: There is no seeing and no one to see.

original: gang rtogs pa //
analyzed: gang rtogs pa //
translated: Whoever realizes the essence of whatever is seen

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa yin //
translated: realizes my nature, the all-creating one.

original: kye; ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus kun //üîΩkun byed skye ba med par kun gnas par //
analyzed: kye; ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus kun // kun byed skye ba med par kun gnas par //
translated: All phenomena, without exception, manifest in such a way.

original: su zhig snying po'i don la rtogs 'dod pas //
analyzed: su zhig snying po'i don la rtogs 'dod pas //
translated: Whoever wishes to realize the ultimate meaning of the essence

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs par gyis //
translated: should realize my nature, the all-creating one.

original: kye; kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma rtogs par //üîΩso sor bstan pa'i lung dang yid 'thad cing //
analyzed: kye; kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma rtogs par // so sor bstan pa'i lung dang yid 'thad cing //
translated: Without realizing my nature, the all-creating one,üîΩthose who engage in the meaning revealed by the scriptures and their commentaries

original: sku gsum ston pa'i don la gang 'jug pa //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa'i don la gang 'jug pa //
translated: and the meaning revealed by the teacher of the three kayas

original: kun byed nga yi don dang shin tu 'gal //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi don dang shin tu 'gal //
translated: are in utter conflict with the meaning of the all-creating one.

original: kye; ston pa kun byed nga nyid ma gtogs par //
analyzed: kye; ston pa kun byed nga nyid ma gtogs par //
translated: Except for me, the teacher, the all-creating one,

original: lta ba'i rang bzhin kun mkhyen skye med 'di //
analyzed: lta ba'i rang bzhin kun mkhyen skye med 'di //
translated: this unborn, omniscient nature of viewüîΩis not realized, is not realized, and will not be realized

original: 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs sangs rgyas kyis //
analyzed: 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs sangs rgyas kyis //
translated: by the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: ma rtogs mi rtogs rtogs par lung mi ston //
analyzed: ma rtogs mi rtogs rtogs par lung mi ston //
translated: It is not revealed in their transmissions.

original: mi skyes skye ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //
analyzed: mi skyes skye ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //
translated: And buddhas, who are unborn and do not come into being,

original: kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad nas ni //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad nas ni //
translated: Encounter my transmission, All-Creating One,

original: des kyang lta ba skye med rab tu rtogs //
analyzed: des kyang lta ba skye med rab tu rtogs //
translated: And so they fully realize the view that is unborn.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs //
translated: They are empowered as the essence of all buddhas.

original: kye; kun byed rgyal po ston pa'i lung med na //
analyzed: kye; kun byed rgyal po ston pa'i lung med na //
translated: ‚ÄúOh! Without the transmission of the teacher, the all-creating monarch,üîΩThe buddhas of the three times, sentient beings of the three realms,üîΩYogins who view the unborn path,

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can dang // ma skyes lam la lta ba'i rnal 'byor dang // la dgu lung dgu rgal yang sa bcu yis //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can dang // ma skyes lam la lta ba'i rnal 'byor dang // la dgu lung dgu rgal yang sa bcu yis //
translated: And those on the ten levels, though they have crossed the nine chasms and received the nine transmissions,

original: rang rang dngos po'i don la rtog dpyod pas //
analyzed: rang rang dngos po'i don la rtog dpyod pas //
translated: Investigate and analyze the significance of their respective things.

original: ma skyes snying po'i don la sgrib pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ma skyes snying po'i don la sgrib pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of this, they are obscured with respect to the significance of the unborn heart essence.

original: rgyu 'bras bral ba'i byang chub snying po 'di //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras bral ba'i byang chub snying po 'di //
translated: This heart essence of enlightenment, free of causes and results,

original: kun gyi lta ba'i don 'di rtogs pa med //
analyzed: kun gyi lta ba'i don 'di rtogs pa med //
translated: Is not realized as the significance of the view of all.

original: kye; de bas ston pa kun byed nga yis kyang //
analyzed: kye; de bas ston pa kun byed nga yis kyang //
translated: ‚ÄúOh! Therefore, I, the teacher, the all-creating one,üîΩHave given the transmission of the explanation

original: 'khor gyi dang po sems dpa' rdo @95b rje la //üîΩsku gsum ston pa gsum gyis bshad pa'i lung //
analyzed: 'khor gyi dang po sems dpa' rdo @95b rje la //üîΩsku gsum ston pa gsum gyis bshad pa'i lung //
translated: To the first member of the retinue, the bodhisattva Vajra.

original: de la ma gnas shig par nga lung ston //
analyzed: de la ma gnas shig par nga lung ston //
translated: Do not abide in that, I prophesy.

original: de ltar nges pa'i lung 'di ma bstan na //
analyzed: de ltar nges pa'i lung 'di ma bstan na //
translated: If this definitive prophecy is not revealed,

original: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po //
translated: The great-grandfather of all victorious ones of the three times,

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yi gdud chad nas //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yi gdud chad nas //
translated: The all-creating monarch, will be cut off,

original: kun kyang 'khor pa'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: kun kyang 'khor pa'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur //
translated: And all will be immersed in the paths of samsara.

original: kye; de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang //
analyzed: kye; de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang //
translated: O great and courageous one, you too

original: lta dang mi blta yul la 'das pa la //
analyzed: lta dang mi blta yul la 'das pa la //
translated: Should transcend the domain of what is and is not to be seen.

original: gang bltas don la rnam rtog mched pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang bltas don la rnam rtog mched pa'i phyir //
translated: Since the proliferation of thoughts occurs in regard to what is seen,

original: rgyu 'bras can gyi lta ba khyod ma rtogs //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras can gyi lta ba khyod ma rtogs //
translated: You have not realized the view that entails causality.

original: shin tu rnal 'byor mi gnas theg pa la //
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor mi gnas theg pa la //
translated: In the nonabiding vehicle of utter yoga,

original: bltas shing brtags pas mthong ba'i don 'gag pas //
analyzed: bltas shing brtags pas mthong ba'i don 'gag pas //
translated: The significance of what is seen is blocked by looking and examining.

original: ma bcos snying po kun byed rang bzhin la //
analyzed: ma bcos snying po kun byed rang bzhin la //
translated: In the uncontrived heart essence, the nature of all-creating activity,

original: bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don du rtogs //
analyzed: bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don du rtogs //
translated: The significance of nonseeing is realized by looking.

original: kye; kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni //
analyzed: kye; kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni //
translated: O all-creating monarch, I am awakened mind.

original: chos rnams kun gyi blta ba'i me long ste //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi blta ba'i me long ste //
translated: I am the mirror in which all phenomena are seen.

original: gsal la rang bzhin med par kun 'char bas //
analyzed: gsal la rang bzhin med par kun 'char bas //
translated: Since everything arises in me, clear yet without intrinsic nature,üîΩI am the mirror in which all phenomena are seen.

original: ma bltas rang bzhin gsal bar lung bstan to //
analyzed: ma bltas rang bzhin gsal bar lung bstan to //
translated: Without looking, the nature is clearly revealed.

original: ma skyes de bzhin nyid kyi yul nyid la //üîΩblta ba'i yul med mthong ba chen por rtogs //
analyzed: ma skyes de bzhin nyid kyi yul nyid la // blta ba'i yul med mthong ba chen por rtogs //
translated: In the unborn domain of suchness itself,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: The domain of seeing is absent, and so it is realized as the great seeing.üîΩCHAPTER 9üîΩThe Inexpressible Nature of Mind

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las; skye ba med pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las; skye ba med pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o ////
translated: The Inexpressible Nature of MindüîΩThen the all-creating king, bodhichitta, taught this:

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: The realization that there is no samaya to uphold:üîΩKye!

original: @96a *// kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po 'di //
analyzed: @96a *// kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po 'di //
translated: The teacher of teachers, the all-creating king,

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
translated: The teachers who arise from me, the three kayas,

original: dbang po'i khyad par rim par lung bstan pa //
analyzed: dbang po'i khyad par rim par lung bstan pa //
translated: Have revealed the distinctions of capacity in stages.

original: kun byed bsrung du yod pa'i don du rtogs //üîΩla las sdom dang 'dul khrims dag par rtogs //
analyzed: kun byed bsrung du yod pa'i don du rtogs // la las sdom dang 'dul khrims dag par rtogs //
translated: They are realized to be the meaning of the all-creating, which is to be upheld.üîΩSome realize the purity of vows and ethical conduct.

original: la las rig 'dzin sdom pa dag par rtogs //
analyzed: la las rig 'dzin sdom pa dag par rtogs //
translated: Some realize the purity of the vows of a vidyadhara.

original: la las grangs dang rtsa ba yan lag rtogs //
analyzed: la las grangs dang rtsa ba yan lag rtogs //
translated: Some realize the enumeration of root and branch vows.

original: ji ltar brtags kyang rtogs par lung ma bstan //
analyzed: ji ltar brtags kyang rtogs par lung ma bstan //
translated: No matter how they are conceptualized, they are not revealed to be realized.

original: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig 'di //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig 'di //
translated: The samaya of the all-creating king

original: bsrung dang mi srung phyogs ris med par bstan //
analyzed: bsrung dang mi srung phyogs ris med par bstan //
translated: is shown to be beyond the extremes of being and not being guarded.

original: gang gis bsrung dang mi srung med rtogs pa //
analyzed: gang gis bsrung dang mi srung med rtogs pa //
translated: Those who realize that there is nothing to be guarded

original: kun byed nga yi dam tshig rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi dam tshig rtogs pa yin //
translated: realize the samaya of me, the all-creating one.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //
translated: Kye! I, the teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: rtsa ba byang chub sems su kun gcig las //
analyzed: rtsa ba byang chub sems su kun gcig las //
translated: am the one in whom all are of the same nature‚Äîawakened mind.

original: kun kyang snying po'i dam tshig yin pas na //
analyzed: kun kyang snying po'i dam tshig yin pas na //
translated: Since all are the essence of samaya,

original: bsrung dang mi srung don la 'das par rtogs //
analyzed: bsrung dang mi srung don la 'das par rtogs //
translated: understand that the point is to transcend the concepts of being and not being guarded.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po'i lta ba'i dam tshig ni //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po'i lta ba'i dam tshig ni //
translated: Kye! The samaya of the view of the all-creating monarch

original: skye med nam mkha' lta bur phyogs 'das pas //
analyzed: skye med nam mkha' lta bur phyogs 'das pas //
translated: is nonarising, like space, beyond any position.

original: gang gis de dag legs par rtogs pa de //
analyzed: gang gis de dag legs par rtogs pa de //
translated: Those who realize this

original: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rtogs pa yin //
translated: realize the samaya of the all-creating monarch.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
translated: Kye! I, the teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: dam tshig bsrung du med par lung bstan pa //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrung du med par lung bstan pa //
translated: have proclaimed that there is no samaya to be guarded.

original: tshig tu rtsa ba'i rgyud las gang thos pa //
analyzed: tshig tu rtsa ba'i rgyud las gang thos pa //
translated: Whatever is heard in the root tantra

original: 'dis ni don de legs par rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: 'dis ni don de legs par rtogs pa yin //
translated: This is the proper understanding of that meaning.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal pos snga bar lung bstan ltar //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal pos snga bar lung bstan ltar //
translated: O! Just as the all-creating monarch previously prophesied,

original: dus gsum chos @96b nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dus gsum chos @96b nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: because the nature of phenomena in the three times is unchanging,

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yi dam tshig ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yi dam tshig ni //
translated: it is realized that the sacred pledge of me, the all-creating monarch,

original: dus gsum du ni bsrung du med par rtogs //
analyzed: dus gsum du ni bsrung du med par rtogs //
translated: is not to be observed in the three times.

original: kye / chos rnams rtsa ba sems su gcig pa ltar //
analyzed: kye / chos rnams rtsa ba sems su gcig pa ltar //
translated: O! Just as all phenomena are of one essence in the mind,

original: dam tshig rtsa ba bsrung du med par gcig /
analyzed: dam tshig rtsa ba bsrung du med par gcig /
translated: the sacred pledge is of one essence in being without observance.

original: de yang rang sems skye med rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: de yang rang sems skye med rtogs pa yin //
translated: Moreover, that is the realization that one‚Äôs mind is unborn.

original: phyal ba dang ni med pa gcig pu dang // lhun gyis grub par bsrung ba kun las 'das //
analyzed: phyal ba dang ni med pa gcig pu dang // lhun gyis grub par bsrung ba kun las 'das //
translated: The openness, the nonexistence, the oneness, and the spontaneous presence that are beyond observance

original: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rnam grangs te //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rnam grangs te //
translated: are the enumeration of the sacred pledge of the all-creating monarch,

original: skye ba med par rtogs pa'i rnam grangs yin //
analyzed: skye ba med par rtogs pa'i rnam grangs yin //
translated: the enumeration of the realization of nonarising.

original: snying po bsrung du med par don gcig la //üîΩrtogs dang mi rtogs khyad par la dgongs nas //
analyzed: snying po bsrung du med par don gcig la // rtogs dang mi rtogs khyad par la dgongs nas //
translated: The one meaning of the essence that is not to be observedüîΩis intended for those who have realized the difference between realization and nonrealization.

original: drang dang nges pa gnyis su rnam phye nas //
analyzed: drang dang nges pa gnyis su rnam phye nas //
translated: Having distinguished between the provisional and the definitive,

original: bsrung du yod dang med par lung bstan to //
analyzed: bsrung du yod dang med par lung bstan to //
translated: It is taught that there is and is not something to be observed.

original: kye / 'dis ni dam tshig bsrung med rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kye / 'dis ni dam tshig bsrung med rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Since this is the realization that there is no samaya to observe,

original: dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs pa yin //
translated: it is the realization of the transcendent state of victorious ones of the three times.

original: gang gis 'di ma rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: gang gis 'di ma rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Yogins and yoginƒ´s who have not realized this

original: rang sems snying po'i don la shin tu 'gal //
analyzed: rang sems snying po'i don la shin tu 'gal //
translated: are very far from the meaning of the heart essence of their own minds.

original: kye / kun byed nga yi dam las gang 'das shing //
analyzed: kye / kun byed nga yi dam las gang 'das shing //
translated: Those who transgress my commitments, all-creating one,

original: sku gsum ston pa'i dam la gnas pa dag /üîΩbskal pa brgya phrag du ma rnams su yang //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa'i dam la gnas pa dag / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma rnams su yang //
translated: and abide by the commitments of the teachers of the three kayasüîΩwill find it extremely difficult to encounter the meaning of the heart essence

original: snying po'i don dang phrad par shin tu dka'//
analyzed: snying po'i don dang phrad par shin tu dka'//
translated: even in many hundreds of eons.

original: de phyir kun byed nga yi lung thob pas //
analyzed: de phyir kun byed nga yi lung thob pas //
translated: Therefore, having received the transmission of me, the all-creating one,

original: dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs par byos //üîΩzhes gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs par byos // zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: you should realize that there is no samaya to observe.

original: bsrung med dam tshig gi le'u ste drug cu pa'o ////üîΩde nas @97a *//
analyzed: bsrung med dam tshig gi le'u ste drug cu pa'o //// de nas @97a *//
translated: This completes the sixtieth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, the mind of enlightenment, in which is taught that there is no samaya to observe.üîΩThen, the all-creating monarch, the mind of enlightenment, spoke these words:

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des phrin las btsal du med pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des phrin las btsal du med pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: The absence of seeking enlightened activity.

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs shig /
translated: O great and courageous one, understand this well!

original: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga'i //üîΩrang bzhin las byung ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga'i // rang bzhin las byung ston pa sku gsum gyis //
translated: I am the all-creating monarch, the teacher of teachers.üîΩThe teachers of the three kayas, who arise from my nature,

original: so so ji ltar 'dul ba'i skur byung nas //
analyzed: so so ji ltar 'dul ba'i skur byung nas //
translated: appear in forms that tame beings in accordance with their individual needs.

original: phrin las btsal bas don dang phrad par rtogs //
analyzed: phrin las btsal bas don dang phrad par rtogs //
translated: They think that by pursuing activities, they will encounter the ultimate meaning.

original: lus kyi las su phyag rgya bca' bar rtogs //
analyzed: lus kyi las su phyag rgya bca' bar rtogs //
translated: They think that physical activity is to form mudras.

original: ngag gis sngags dang bzlas pa byed par rtogs //
analyzed: ngag gis sngags dang bzlas pa byed par rtogs //
translated: They think that verbal activity is to recite mantras.

original: sems kyis 'phro 'du ting 'dzin bsgom par rtogs //
analyzed: sems kyis 'phro 'du ting 'dzin bsgom par rtogs //
translated: They think that mental activity is to cultivate samƒÅdhi.

original: sgo gsum yal bar gnas pas grub mi rtogs //
analyzed: sgo gsum yal bar gnas pas grub mi rtogs //
translated: They think that accomplishment is to rest in the abandonment of the three doors.

original: kye / ston pa kun byed nga yi 'phrin las ni //
analyzed: kye / ston pa kun byed nga yi 'phrin las ni //
translated: O teacher, my activity, the all-creating one,

original: btsal bar bya med phrin las lung bstan pas //
analyzed: btsal bar bya med phrin las lung bstan pas //
translated: is not to be pursued. Since it is explained to be activity,üîΩit is the ultimate meaning that is not contradicted, and the intent is fulfilled.

original: don dang mi 'gal bsam pa mthar phyung bas; ;phrin las btsal du med par khyod kyis rtogs //
analyzed: don dang mi 'gal bsam pa mthar phyung bas; ;phrin las btsal du med par khyod kyis rtogs //
translated: You should understand that my activity is not to be pursued.

original: kye / ston pa kun byed nga yi 'phrin las ni //
analyzed: kye / ston pa kun byed nga yi 'phrin las ni //
translated: O teacher, my activity, the all-creating one,

original: bdag don lhun gyis grub pas bya med rtogs //
analyzed: bdag don lhun gyis grub pas bya med rtogs //
translated: is understood to be inaction, since the benefit for myself is spontaneously present.

original: gzhan don dbyings su gcig pas btsal med rtogs //
analyzed: gzhan don dbyings su gcig pas btsal med rtogs //
translated: Since the benefit of others is one within basic space, realize that there is no need to seek it.

original: de ltar khyod kyis nges par rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: de ltar khyod kyis nges par rtogs par gyis //
translated: You should definitely realize this.

original: kye / kun byed byang chub sems su kun byas pas //
analyzed: kye / kun byed byang chub sems su kun byas pas //
translated: O great and courageous one, since everything is created within the mind of the allcreating one,

original: byang chub sems la bya mi dgos par rtogs //
analyzed: byang chub sems la bya mi dgos par rtogs //
translated: realize that there is no need to create anything within awakened mind.

original: ma byas bya bral snying po byang chub la //
analyzed: ma byas bya bral snying po byang chub la //
translated: In the heart essence of enlightenment, which is not created and from which nothing need be created,

original: bya dang mi bya tha snyad gang gis gdags //
analyzed: bya dang mi bya tha snyad gang gis gdags //
translated: what terms could apply to something that is or is not created?

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi phrin las ni //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi phrin las ni //
translated: O great and courageous one, my activity as the allcreating monarch

original: lus kyi las su @97b phyag rgya byar med rtogs //
analyzed: lus kyi las su @97b phyag rgya byar med rtogs //

original: ngag gis bzlas brjod byar med snying por rtogs //
analyzed: ngag gis bzlas brjod byar med snying por rtogs //
translated: It is realized to be without verbal activity, such as mantra repetition, and to be the heart essence.

original: sems kyis 'phro 'du sgom dang bral bar rtogs //
analyzed: sems kyis 'phro 'du sgom dang bral bar rtogs //

original: 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs pa dang // phrin las bya med rtogs nas mngon sangs rgyas //
analyzed: 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs pa dang // phrin las bya med rtogs nas mngon sangs rgyas //

original: dus gsum rgyal ba rtogs la rag lus pas //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba rtogs la rag lus pas //
translated: Since the realization of victorious ones of the three times depends on this,

original: sems dpa' rdo rje thos nas rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje thos nas rtogs par gyis //

original: kye / nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: kye / nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //

original: zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i lung bstan pa //
analyzed: zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i lung bstan pa //

original: rnam rtog mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la //
analyzed: rnam rtog mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la //

original: 'dul ba'i rtog pa grangs su bstan pa yin //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i rtog pa grangs su bstan pa yin //

original: kye / de phyir kun byed nga yis lung bstan pa //
analyzed: kye / de phyir kun byed nga yis lung bstan pa //

original: thos pa'i don la ma nor brtag par byos //
analyzed: thos pa'i don la ma nor brtag par byos //
translated: Is to be understood without error in the meaning of the aural lineage.

original: bya rtsol kun dang bral ba'i phrin las kyis //
analyzed: bya rtsol kun dang bral ba'i phrin las kyis //

original: ma byas don kun rdzogs pas rtogs pa 'char //
analyzed: ma byas don kun rdzogs pas rtogs pa 'char //
translated: The meaning of nonaction is perfect, and realization arises.üîΩO!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par rtogs //üîΩsnying po bya rtsol med pa'i don rtogs pas //
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par rtogs // snying po bya rtsol med pa'i don rtogs pas //

original: bya dang mi bya med par don rdzogs pas //
analyzed: bya dang mi bya med par don rdzogs pas //

original: kun byed rgyal po'i phrin las 'di rtogs shig /
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i phrin las 'di rtogs shig /

analyzed: kye / ston pa'i rgyal po kun byed nga yis ni //
translated: I, the all-creating king of teachers,

original: byas pa thams cad mtshan ma'i lam du bstan //
analyzed: byas pa thams cad mtshan ma'i lam du bstan //

original: bya bral phrin las nges don 'di rtogs pas //
analyzed: bya bral phrin las nges don 'di rtogs pas //

original: 'gro ba kun byed rgyal po nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun byed rgyal po nyid du 'gyur //

original: snying po bya bral sgo gsum ma nor bas //
analyzed: snying po bya bral sgo gsum ma nor bas //

analyzed: bya rtsol 'das pa'i don la rtogs pa ni // dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa gcig pa'i phyir //

analyzed: ma nor lam la rtogs pa nyid mchog @98a *// yin; ;zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: sgo gsum bya ba med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, the all-creating king, bodhicitta, spoke this chapter on the realization that the ma·πá·∏çala is not created.üîΩKye!

analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di da rtogs shig /

analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis // mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba'i gdul bya la //

analyzed: tshogs dang dkyil 'khor bskyed du yod par bstan //
translated: taught that the ma·πá·∏çala and assembly can be createdüîΩfor those to be tamed who delight in signs and enumeration.üîΩThose who rely on the path of the three kƒÅyas

analyzed: gang zhig sku gsum lam la bsten byas nas; ;mtshan ma grangs kyi sgo nas rtog byed pa //

original: bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag yun ring du //
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag yun ring du //

analyzed: bskyed cing bsag tu med pa'i don rtogs na //

analyzed: de ni dkyil 'khor snying po @98b kun gyi rtsa //

analyzed: gang gis de dag rdzogs par gang rtogs pa //

analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //

analyzed: kye / rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: Ky√©! The ma·πá·∏çala of the five naturally occurring wisdomsüîΩdepends on the meaning of realization and nonrealization,

analyzed: rtogs dang ma rtogs don la rag lus pas; ;bskyed dang mi bskyed gnyis su mthong ba yin //

analyzed: gang gis de la rtogs pa skyes ma thag /

analyzed: kun byed rgyal po don la 'byor bar 'gyur //

analyzed: rtogs pa ci bder mnos la ma rtsol cig /

analyzed: kye / rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed ngas //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par don rtogs pas //

analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po @99a *// chags sdang rnam pa lnga //

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: this is chapter sixty-two: The Realization That the Ma·πá·∏çala Is Not Created.

analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dbang la bskur du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, concerning the empowerment that is realized to be unbestowed, the all-creating mind of awakening, the following is taught.üîΩKye!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di des rtogs shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di des rtogs shig /

original: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //

analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //

original: dbang la bskur thabs yod par lung phog pa //
analyzed: dbang la bskur thabs yod par lung phog pa //

original: mtshan ma'i rtog pa'i lam la zhen chags pas //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i rtog pa'i lam la zhen chags pas //

analyzed: nga yis nga bzhin mi mthong bskal bar 'gyur //
translated: will not see me as I am for eons.üîΩKye!

original: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: I am the teacher, the all-creating monarch.

original: nga yi rang bzhin kun byed khyab rtogs pas //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin kun byed khyab rtogs pas //

analyzed: nga la gnyis pa'i don ni med pa'i phyir //

analyzed: bskur dang mi bskur don dang bral bar rtogs //

original: gang zag mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la //
analyzed: gang zag mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la //

original: ma bcos don la gnas pa'i gang zag la //
analyzed: ma bcos don la gnas pa'i gang zag la //

original: ma bskur rang bzhin gnas pa'i rim pa bstan //
analyzed: ma bskur rang bzhin gnas pa'i rim pa bstan //

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin kun khyab pas //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin kun khyab pas //

analyzed: de ltar 'jug cing rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la //

analyzed: ma bskur rang @99b bzhin gnas pa'i don rtogs pas //

original: dbang la bskur thob med par lung ston cig /
analyzed: dbang la bskur thob med par lung ston cig /

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //

analyzed: bskur thob med par rtogs nas lung bstan pas; ;skye med rnam dag sems kyi dbang thob nas //

original: rang bzhin bcu yi dbang la rtsol mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin bcu yi dbang la rtsol mi 'gyur //

original: sngags dang phyag rgya'i dbang la re mi 'jog /
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya'i dbang la re mi 'jog /

original: rdzas dang mtshan ma'i dbang la sems mi 'chags //
analyzed: rdzas dang mtshan ma'i dbang la sems mi 'chags //

original: rang rgyud dag pas mtshan ma'i lha mi bsgom //
analyzed: rang rgyud dag pas mtshan ma'i lha mi bsgom //

original: gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs rim pa med //
analyzed: gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs rim pa med //
translated: There will be no planets, lunar mansions, or seasonal periods.

original: kye / ston pa'i rgyal po nga yis rtogs pa ltar //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i rgyal po nga yis rtogs pa ltar //

analyzed: sku gsum ston pa gsum gyis ma rtogs pas //

analyzed: rang bzhin bcu yi don la bsgribs pa'i phyir //

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med //
translated: there is no realization of my nature, the all-creating one.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
translated: O teacher, teacher of the all-creating monarch,

original: 'khor gyi dang po sku gsum ston pa las //
analyzed: 'khor gyi dang po sku gsum ston pa las //

original: rang bzhin ma bcos ji bzhin lung phog pa //
analyzed: rang bzhin ma bcos ji bzhin lung phog pa //
translated: the unfabricated nature is just as it is, and the transmission is received.

original: mtshan ma'i 'jig rten lha la rten mi 'cha'//
analyzed: mtshan ma'i 'jig rten lha la rten mi 'cha'//
translated: Do not rely on the world of signs or on the gods.

original: tshogs la mi rten dbang la rag ma lus //
analyzed: tshogs la mi rten dbang la rag ma lus //
translated: Do not rely on the assembly or be dependent on empowerment.

original: skye med rig pa'i dbang la kun rdzogs pas //
analyzed: skye med rig pa'i dbang la kun rdzogs pas //

original: ma btsal bde bar bzhag pas don kun rdzogs //
analyzed: ma btsal bde bar bzhag pas don kun rdzogs //
translated: the meaning of all is perfect in resting without searching, in bliss.

original: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: O teacher, I am the all-creating monarch.üîΩThe three kayas, the teachers, are arrayed by me,

original: sku gsum ston pa nga yis bkod pa yin; ;des bstan bcos kyang nga yis bkod pa yin //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa nga yis bkod pa yin; ;des bstan bcos kyang nga yis bkod pa yin //
