original: rang nyid rang la bkod pa bya mi dgos //
analyzed: rang nyid rang la bkod pa bya mi dgos //
translated: There is no need to array myself in myself.

original: kye / de ltar kun byed rang bzhin gang rtogs pas //
analyzed: kye / de ltar kun byed rang bzhin gang rtogs pas //
translated: O teacher, in that way, by realizing the nature of the all-creating one,

original: thams cad kun byed rang @100a *//
analyzed: thams cad kun byed rang @100a *//
translated: all is the all-creating one.

original: bzhin de rtogs pas //
analyzed: bzhin de rtogs pas //
translated: By realizing that nature,

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs kyis la //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs kyis la //
translated: Realize my nature, all-creating one,

original: mtshan 'dzin zhen pa'i dbang la ma rten cig /üîΩgsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las //
analyzed: mtshan 'dzin zhen pa'i dbang la ma rten cig / gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las //
translated: and do not rely on the power of fixating on the characteristics of things.

original: rang 'byung rtogs pa'i dbang gi le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: rang 'byung rtogs pa'i dbang gi le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o ////
translated: This is the sixty-third chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the empowerment of the realization of the self-originated.üîΩCHAPTER 64

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lam la bgrod du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lam la bgrod du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, spoke these words:üîΩ‚ÄúKye!

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yi //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yi //
translated: The all-creating monarch, the teacher of teachers,

original: rang bzhin ma skyes gcig tu gnas pa la //
analyzed: rang bzhin ma skyes gcig tu gnas pa la //
translated: is unborn by nature and abides as one.

original: skye med mngon du rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir //
analyzed: skye med mngon du rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is difficult to realize the manifest state of nonorigination,

original: 'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum gyis //üîΩrang rang dga' ba'i lam la gzud pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum gyis // rang rang dga' ba'i lam la gzud pa'i phyir //
translated: the teacher of the first of the retinues, the teacher of the three kayas,üîΩtaught that there are paths to traverse

original: lam gyi khyad par bgrod du yod par bstan //
analyzed: lam gyi khyad par bgrod du yod par bstan //
translated: in order to guide beings into the path that delights me.

original: blo chung rgyud nas don la 'dren pa'i phyir //
analyzed: blo chung rgyud nas don la 'dren pa'i phyir //
translated: Because he was guiding those of lesser intellect,

original: drang ba'i lung du nga yis rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: drang ba'i lung du nga yis rtogs pa yin //
translated: I realized that his teachings were provisional.

original: kye / tshogs dang sbyor lam mthong lam sgom pa'i lam //
analyzed: kye / tshogs dang sbyor lam mthong lam sgom pa'i lam //
translated: O! The paths of accumulation, linkage, seeing, and meditation,üîΩAnd the path of consummation‚Äî

original: mthar phyin rim pa bskal pa brgya phrag dang // tshes gsum bdun sogs dus der 'grub par rtogs //
analyzed: mthar phyin rim pa bskal pa brgya phrag dang // tshes gsum bdun sogs dus der 'grub par rtogs //
translated: It is thought that these are traversed in a hundred eons, three months, seven days, and so forth,

original: de yis nga yi lam 'di rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis nga yi lam 'di rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: But this is not how my path is realized.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam bshad pa //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam bshad pa //
translated: O! I, the all-creating monarch, explain my path.

original: nga nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: nga nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
translated: I am by nature unborn,

original: 'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das //
analyzed: 'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das //
translated: Totally beyond the words ‚Äúto enter‚Äù or ‚Äúnot to enter.‚Äù

original: de phyir lam la bgrod du med par rtogs //
analyzed: de phyir lam la bgrod du med par rtogs //
translated: Therefore, realize that there is no traversing the path.

original: lam sngar snang ba rnam rtog mtshan ma'i grangs //
analyzed: lam sngar snang ba rnam rtog mtshan ma'i grangs //
translated: The paths that have appeared previously are the enumeration of conceptual marks.

original: nga nyid mtshan ma'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nga nyid mtshan ma'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir //
translated: Because I am beyond the domain of conceptual marks,

original: @100b mtshan ma'i lam gyis bgrod du med par rtogs //
analyzed: @100b mtshan ma'i lam gyis bgrod du med par rtogs //
translated: Realize that the path of conceptual marks is not to be traversed.

original: kye / kun byed nga yi lam la rim med de //
analyzed: kye / kun byed nga yi lam la rim med de //
translated: O! On my path, the all-creating one, there is no question of stages,

original: skye med theg le chen por gcig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: skye med theg le chen por gcig pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the oneness of the unborn, the great sphere of being.

original: gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pa de yi phyir /
analyzed: gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pa de yi phyir /
translated: Because of the realization that this is the nature of the one,

original: lam la bgrod med gcig tu rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: lam la bgrod med gcig tu rtogs pa yin //
translated: It is realized that the path is traversed in oneness.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //
translated: Ah! I, the all-creating monarch, am the teacher‚Äôs teacher.

original: nga la 'jug pa'i rim pa'i lam med de //
analyzed: nga la 'jug pa'i rim pa'i lam med de //
translated: There is no path of stages to enter into me.üîΩBecause self-originated wisdom is perfect in a single instant,

original: rang 'byung ye shes dus gcig rdzogs pa'i phyir; ;ma bgrod rang bzhin bzhag pas phyin par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes dus gcig rdzogs pa'i phyir; ;ma bgrod rang bzhin bzhag pas phyin par 'gyur //
translated: without traveling, you will arrive by resting naturally.

original: de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid kyis //
analyzed: de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid kyis //
translated: Therefore, you, the spiritual being Vajra,

original: nga la rim par bgrod par ma byed cig /
analyzed: nga la rim par bgrod par ma byed cig /
translated: do not make stages to traverse in coming to me.

original: kye; nga ni mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: kye; nga ni mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
translated: Ah! I am the nature of space, free from extremes.

original: nam mkha'i mtha' la bgrong cing tshi chad ltar //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' la bgrong cing tshi chad ltar //
translated: Just as it is impossible to count the limits of space,

original: nga yi rang bzhin lam gyis bgrod 'dod pa //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin lam gyis bgrod 'dod pa //
translated: those who wish to traverse the path to my nature

original: tshi chad nad du de las che ba med //
analyzed: tshi chad nad du de las che ba med //
translated: have a fatal illness, for there is nothing greater than that.

original: de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje rtogs nas kyang //
analyzed: de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje rtogs nas kyang //
translated: Therefore, you, the spiritual being Vajra, having realized,

original: khyod kyis 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig /
translated: should prophesy to the retinue.

original: da ltar nga yi rang bzhin lung bstan pas //
analyzed: da ltar nga yi rang bzhin lung bstan pas //
translated: By prophesying my nature now,

original: kun kyang nga yi rang bzhin nyid rtogs 'gyur //
analyzed: kun kyang nga yi rang bzhin nyid rtogs 'gyur //
translated: all will realize my very nature.

original: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i lam la zhen mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i lam la zhen mi 'gyur //
translated: They will not be attached to the worldly path of characteristics.

original: rnam grangs tshig gi lam la rtsod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam grangs tshig gi lam la rtsod mi 'gyur //
translated: There is no dispute about the path of enumerated words.

original: ma bcos der bzhag rtogs pas pha rol phyin //
analyzed: ma bcos der bzhag rtogs pas pha rol phyin //
translated: By realizing the uncontrived, uncorrupted state, one reaches the other side.

original: kun gyi snying po'i lam dang phrad par 'gyur //
analyzed: kun gyi snying po'i lam dang phrad par 'gyur //
translated: One encounters the path that is the heart essence of them all.

original: kye / nga ni kun byed chos kyi gzhi ma ste //
analyzed: kye / nga ni kun byed chos kyi gzhi ma ste //
translated: O! I am the all-creating ground of being,

original: lam lnga sa bcur ston pa'i sku gsung yang //
analyzed: lam lnga sa bcur ston pa'i sku gsung yang //
translated: and even the kayas and speech that reveal the five paths and ten levels

original: nga yi rang bzhin mngon du bstan pa yin //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin mngon du bstan pa yin //
translated: are the manifest nature of me, the all-creating one.

original: de ltar khyod kyis legs par rtogs par gyis //üîΩma bcos bgrod med kun @101a *//
analyzed: de ltar khyod kyis legs par rtogs par gyis // ma bcos bgrod med kun @101a *//
translated: You should realize this to be so.üîΩThe uncontrived, uncorrupted path of the all-creating one

original: byed kun gyi lam //
analyzed: byed kun gyi lam //
translated: is not traversed.

original: su zhig bgrod pas byang chub don mi rtogs //
analyzed: su zhig bgrod pas byang chub don mi rtogs //
translated: No one will realize the ultimate meaning of enlightenment by traversing it,

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'gyur //üîΩde bas bgrod du med pa'i don la rtogs //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'gyur // de bas bgrod du med pa'i don la rtogs //
translated: nor will anyone realize the nature of me, the all-creating one.

original: zhes gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Therefore, realize the ultimate meaning of what is not to be traversed.

original: lam la bgrod du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: lam la bgrod du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This is the sixty-fourth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the realization that there is no traversing the paths.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sa la sbyang du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sa la sbyang du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, concerning the realization that there is nothing to train in on the levels, the all-creating mind of awakening, the following is taught.üîΩOh!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par rtogs //
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par rtogs //
translated: Bodhisattva Vajra, understand this point well!

original: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: The teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: sa la sbyang du med par bstan pa ni //
analyzed: sa la sbyang du med par bstan pa ni //
translated: has revealed that there is nothing to train in on the levels.

original: kun gyi yul min brtag pa rab tu dka'//
analyzed: kun gyi yul min brtag pa rab tu dka'//
translated: This is not the domain of everyone, and it is extremely difficult to investigate.üîΩOh!

original: kye / nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: kye / nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
translated: The teachers who emerge from me, the three buddha bodies,

original: dman pa'i rim pa bgrod cing sbyangs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dman pa'i rim pa bgrod cing sbyangs pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to traverse the stages of the inferior and train,

original: rnam rtog grangs la dga' ba'i gang zag la //
analyzed: rnam rtog grangs la dga' ba'i gang zag la //
translated: for individuals who delight in the enumeration of concepts,

original: sa yi rnam grangs bcu dang drug tu bstan //
analyzed: sa yi rnam grangs bcu dang drug tu bstan //
translated: have revealed the enumeration of the levels as ten and six.

original: bstan pa de bzhin 'khor gyis de ltar rtogs //
analyzed: bstan pa de bzhin 'khor gyis de ltar rtogs //
translated: The retinue understands the teaching in that way.

original: rnam rtog blo yis grangs la snang bar zad //
analyzed: rnam rtog blo yis grangs la snang bar zad //
translated: It is simply the conceptual mind that perceives the enumeration.üîΩOh!

original: kye / sa drug grangs kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
analyzed: kye / sa drug grangs kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
translated: The nature of the enumeration of the six levels is revealed.

original: kun tu 'od dang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje 'chang dang stug po bkod pa dang // padma spyan dang rdo rje sems dpa'i sa //
analyzed: kun tu 'od dang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje 'chang dang stug po bkod pa dang // padma spyan dang rdo rje sems dpa'i sa //
translated: Lotus-Eyed One, and Vajrasattva

original: rim bgrod rnal 'byor don du gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: rim bgrod rnal 'byor don du gsungs pa ste //
translated: are taught for the sake of yogic practitioners who progress in stages.

original: lha dang ting 'dzin khyad par re re gsungs //
analyzed: lha dang ting 'dzin khyad par re re gsungs //
translated: Each is said to be distinct in terms of deity and meditative absorption.

original: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po sa bstan pa //
analyzed: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po sa bstan pa //
translated: O teacher, the teaching of the stage of the all-creating monarch

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus @101b pa; ;skye med chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus @101b pa; ;skye med chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir //
translated: is that all phenomena, however they appear, are without exception of one taste in the unborn basic space of phenomena.

original: sa yi khyad par med de gcig tu rtags //
analyzed: sa yi khyad par med de gcig tu rtags //
translated: Therefore, the distinctions of the stages are not distinct; they are all signified as one.

original: kun byed nga yis la ma sbyar na //
analyzed: kun byed nga yis la ma sbyar na //
translated: If I, the all-creating one, am not applied,

original: rtog pa'i sa yi rnam grangs kun thob kyang //
analyzed: rtog pa'i sa yi rnam grangs kun thob kyang //
translated: even though one attains all the categories of conceptual stages,

original: so so rang gi rnam rtog snang ba las //
analyzed: so so rang gi rnam rtog snang ba las //
translated: they are simply the manifestations of one‚Äôs own individual thoughts.

original: kun byed nga dang phrad par lung mi ston //
analyzed: kun byed nga dang phrad par lung mi ston //
translated: It is not prophesied that one will meet with me, the all-creating one.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin ni //
translated: O teacher, the nature of the stage of the all-creating monarch

original: ma bcos ma sbyangs rig pas lhun rdzogs sa //
analyzed: ma bcos ma sbyangs rig pas lhun rdzogs sa //
translated: is uncontrived and unrefined, spontaneously perfect in awareness.

original: sbyangs shing bgrod kyang don dang mi phrad kyi //
analyzed: sbyangs shing bgrod kyang don dang mi phrad kyi //
translated: Even though one refines and traverses the stages, one will not encounter the ultimate meaning.

original: rang bzhin rtogs pas dus gcig rdzogs par byed //
analyzed: rang bzhin rtogs pas dus gcig rdzogs par byed //
translated: Since their nature is realized, they are perfected simultaneously.

original: kye / theg gcig kun byed byang chub sems kyi sa //
analyzed: kye / theg gcig kun byed byang chub sems kyi sa //
translated: O! The one vehicle, the dimension of all-creating awakened mind,

original: skye med khyab pas rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: skye med khyab pas rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: is all-pervasive and unborn, so its nature is realized.

original: gang ltar bgrod pa nam mkha'i mtha' tshol 'dra //
analyzed: gang ltar bgrod pa nam mkha'i mtha' tshol 'dra //
translated: However one travels, it is like seeking the limits of space.üîΩSince one is free by resting in the nature without traveling,

original: ma bgrod rang bzhin bzhag pas grol bar ston //
analyzed: ma bgrod rang bzhin bzhag pas grol bar ston //
translated: this is revealed.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //
translated: O! I, the all-creating monarch, am the teacher‚Äôs teacher.

original: sa yi ngo bo nga nyid shar ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sa yi ngo bo nga nyid shar ba'i phyir //
translated: Because I, the essence of the levels, have dawned,

original: nga yis sa la mtho dman rim pa med //
analyzed: nga yis sa la mtho dman rim pa med //
translated: there are no higher or lower levels in me.

original: kun byed nga yi sa 'di rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi sa 'di rtogs par gyis //
translated: You should realize that this level of mine, the all-creating one,

original: nga nyid kun gyi mdun du mngon phyung yang //
analyzed: nga nyid kun gyi mdun du mngon phyung yang //
translated: is revealed in the presence of everyone,

original: sku gsum 'khor gyis rnam rtog grangs su rtogs //
analyzed: sku gsum 'khor gyis rnam rtog grangs su rtogs //
translated: but the retinue of the three kayas conceptualizes it in terms of enumeration.

original: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa zab mo yang //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa zab mo yang //
translated: Even the profound enlightened intent of the all-creating monarch

original: gang ltar bltas bas mthun par lung mi ston //
analyzed: gang ltar bltas bas mthun par lung mi ston //
translated: does not give predictions in accordance with however it is viewed.

original: kye / nga yi 'khor gyi dang po sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: kye / nga yi 'khor gyi dang po sku gsum gyis //
translated: O! The first of my retinue, the three kayas,

original: rang rang mos pa'i 'khor la chos bstan pa //
analyzed: rang rang mos pa'i 'khor la chos bstan pa //
translated: teach the dharma to their respective retinues in accordance with their individual aspirations.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa re re dang // sa re lam re 'bras bu re re bstan //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa re re dang // sa re lam re 'bras bu re re bstan //
translated: Each of the vehicles of enlightened form, speech, and mind is shown to have its own levels, paths, and results.

original: kun byed nga yi sa lam ma rtogs pa //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi sa lam ma rtogs pa //
translated: But if you do not realize the levels and paths of me, the all-creating one,

original: rnam grangs sa des nges pa'i lam mi rnyed //üîΩdes na sems nyid kun @102a *//
analyzed: rnam grangs sa des nges pa'i lam mi rnyed // des na sems nyid kun @102a *//
translated: you will not find the definitive path through those enumerated levels.üîΩTherefore, the mind itself, the all-creating monarch,

original: theg sems kyis //
analyzed: theg sems kyis //
translated: is the root of all the vehicles.

original: rtsa ba'i sa la bstan par rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sa la bstan par rtogs par gyis //
translated: Understand that it is shown to be the ground of being.

original: sa yi rang bzhin snang med 'di rtogs nas //
analyzed: sa yi rang bzhin snang med 'di rtogs nas //
translated: Having realized that the nature of the levels is nonmanifest,

original: kun byed byang chub sems kyi sa la gnas //üîΩzhes gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems kyi sa la gnas // zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: abide in the level of all-creating awakened mind.üîΩThis is the sixty-fifth chapter, on the realization that there is nothing to be cultivated on the levels, from The Encomium of the True One, in which the genuine state is thoroughly disclosed.

original: sa la sbyang du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: sa la sbyang du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o ////
translated: CHAPTER 66üîΩThe Absence of Acceptance and Rejection in Spiritual Practice

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos spyod pa blang dor med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos spyod pa blang dor med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the enlightened mind of all-creating royal presence taught this to realize the absence of acceptance and rejection in spiritual practice:üîΩKye!

original: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: I am the teacher, the all-creating monarch.

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
translated: The teachers who arise from me, the three kayas,

original: la las dge sbyong sdig pa dor bar rtogs //
analyzed: la las dge sbyong sdig pa dor bar rtogs //
translated: Some realize that spiritual training is to let go of negativity.

original: la las gtsang sme blang dor gnyis su rtogs //
analyzed: la las gtsang sme blang dor gnyis su rtogs //
translated: Some realize purity and impurity as dualistic in terms of acceptance and rejection.

original: la las gtsang sme blang dor gnyis ka spyad par rtogs //
analyzed: la las gtsang sme blang dor gnyis ka spyad par rtogs //
translated: Some realize purity and impurity as dualistic in terms of engaging in both acceptance and rejection.

original: spyad dang ma spyad med pa'i don ma rtogs //
analyzed: spyad dang ma spyad med pa'i don ma rtogs //
translated: They do not realize the meaning of neither engaging nor not engaging.

original: gang dag spyod pa 'di la gnas pa ni //üîΩrang rang gnyen po'i rtogs pa byed pa yis //
analyzed: gang dag spyod pa 'di la gnas pa ni // rang rang gnyen po'i rtogs pa byed pa yis //
translated: Those who abide in this conductüîΩwill realize the mental training in terms of reference points

original: dmigs pa yid la sbyangs pa rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: dmigs pa yid la sbyangs pa rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: through the antidotes that are specific to each individual.

original: blang dor med pa'i spyod pa rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: blang dor med pa'i spyod pa rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: They will not realize the conduct that is free of acceptance and rejection.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po'i spyod pa bstan pa ni //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po'i spyod pa bstan pa ni //
translated: The explanation of the conduct of the all-creating king

original: dge sdig blang dor gtsang sme che chung kun //
analyzed: dge sdig blang dor gtsang sme che chung kun //
translated: is the realization that all virtue and harm, acceptance and rejection, purity and impurity, and good and bad

original: skye med byang chub sems su kun gcig pas //
analyzed: skye med byang chub sems su kun gcig pas //
translated: are of one taste in nonarising awakened mind.

original: blang dang dor ba med pa'i don du rtogs //
analyzed: blang dang dor ba med pa'i don du rtogs //
translated: It is the realization of the meaning of neither accepting nor rejecting.

original: gtsang dang mi gtsang med pa nyid du rtogs //
analyzed: gtsang dang mi gtsang med pa nyid du rtogs //
translated: It is the realization that there is no purity or impurity.

original: spyad dang ma spyad gnyis su med par rtogs //
analyzed: spyad dang ma spyad gnyis su med par rtogs //
translated: It is the realization that there is neither engagement nor nonengagement.

original: mtha' dang dbus su 'byed pa med par @102b rtogs //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus su 'byed pa med par @102b rtogs //
translated: It is the realization that there is no division into limit or center.

original: gzhi rtsa skye med byang chub sems su rtogs //
analyzed: gzhi rtsa skye med byang chub sems su rtogs //
translated: It is the realization that the ground and root are nonarising awakened mind.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po'i spyod pa bstan pa ni //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po'i spyod pa bstan pa ni //
translated: The explanation of the conduct of the all-creating king is this:

original: gang ltar spyod pa de ltar mi 'gal te //
analyzed: gang ltar spyod pa de ltar mi 'gal te //
translated: Whatever conduct there is, it is not contradictory.üîΩSince both what is done and what is not done are nonarising,

original: byas dang ma byas gnyis ka skye med pas; ;shes pas gang ltar spyad pa skye med don //
analyzed: byas dang ma byas gnyis ka skye med pas; ;shes pas gang ltar spyad pa skye med don //
translated: whatever is done by the mind is the meaning of nonarising.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi spyod pa la //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi spyod pa la //
translated: In my conduct as the all-creating king,

original: mkha' ltar gnas pas grangs dang ched gzung med //
analyzed: mkha' ltar gnas pas grangs dang ched gzung med //
translated: abiding like space, there is no enumeration or specification.

original: gnyis su med pas yin min phyogs la 'das //
analyzed: gnyis su med pas yin min phyogs la 'das //
translated: Since there is no duality, I transcend the extremes of being and nonbeing.

original: kun byed byang chub sems kyi spyod par rtogs //üîΩ'dod pa lnga yang sems kyi spyod par rtogs //
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems kyi spyod par rtogs // 'dod pa lnga yang sems kyi spyod par rtogs //
translated: Understand that to be the conduct of all-creating awakened mind.üîΩUnderstand the five sense pleasures to be the conduct of mind.

original: chags sdang lnga yang sems kyi spyod par rtogs //
analyzed: chags sdang lnga yang sems kyi spyod par rtogs //
translated: Understand the five attachments and aversions to be the conduct of mind.

original: rgyan gyi rgyu lnga sems kyi spyod par rtogs //
analyzed: rgyan gyi rgyu lnga sems kyi spyod par rtogs //
translated: Understand the five causes of adornment to be the conduct of mind.

original: khams gsum srid gsum sems kyi spyod par rtogs //üîΩskye med ma rtogs pa yi spyod pa ni //
analyzed: khams gsum srid gsum sems kyi spyod par rtogs // skye med ma rtogs pa yi spyod pa ni //
translated: Understand the three realms and three states of existence to be the conduct of mind.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi mes po ngas ma bshad //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi mes po ngas ma bshad //
translated: I, the grandfather of all victorious ones, do not explain the conduct of those who have not realized nonarising.

original: kye / de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis ni //
analyzed: kye / de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis ni //
translated: O spiritual warrior,

original: kun byed nga yi spyod pa 'di rtogs la //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi spyod pa 'di rtogs la //
translated: Those who realize this conduct of mine, the all-creating one,

original: blang dor med par kun gyis rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: blang dor med par kun gyis rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: will realize that there is nothing to adopt or reject.

original: nga yi 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig /
analyzed: nga yi 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig /
translated: So prophesy to my retinue.

original: kun byed nga yi spyod pa ma gtog par //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi spyod pa ma gtog par //
translated: Except for my conduct, the all-creating one,

original: sku gsum ston pa'i 'khor la gang zhen pas //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa'i 'khor la gang zhen pas //
translated: those who cling to the teachings of the three kayas,üîΩthe teachers‚Äô retinue,

original: 'jig rten log pa'i lta spyod la 'chol nas //
analyzed: 'jig rten log pa'i lta spyod la 'chol nas //
translated: will be confused about the conduct of worldly, wayward views,

original: blang dor med pa'i spyod pa rtogs mi byed //
analyzed: blang dor med pa'i spyod pa rtogs mi byed //
translated: and will not realize the conduct that is beyond adopting or rejecting.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ky√©! The teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: 'khor gyi nang du spyod pa'i lung bstan pa //
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du spyod pa'i lung bstan pa //
translated: prophesies to the retinue about conduct.

original: ma chags blang dor med pa'i spyod pa yis //
analyzed: ma chags blang dor med pa'i spyod pa yis //
translated: Through conduct that is free of attachment and beyond acceptance or rejection,

original: thams cad skye med mnyam par rtogs lung bstan //üîΩsems dpa' @103a *//
analyzed: thams cad skye med mnyam par rtogs lung bstan // sems dpa' @103a *//
translated: all will realize and be prophesied to be unborn and equal.

original: rdo rjes 'khor la lung bstan pas //
analyzed: rdo rjes 'khor la lung bstan pas //
translated: The bodhisattva Vajra prophesied to the retinue,

original: 'khor kyang blang dor med par rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'khor kyang blang dor med par rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: and the retinue realized that there is nothing to adopt or reject.

original: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams ni //
translated: Dharmas of samsara and nirvana

original: skye ba med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar //
analyzed: skye ba med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar //
translated: are unborn, like the nature of space.

original: nga dang khyod kyis rtogs pa ji lta bar //
analyzed: nga dang khyod kyis rtogs pa ji lta bar //
translated: Just as I and you have realized it,

original: khyod kyis 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig /
translated: you should proclaim it to your retinue.

original: snga bar lung bstan thos pa la brten nas //
analyzed: snga bar lung bstan thos pa la brten nas //
translated: Based on hearing the earlier proclamation,

original: rtogs pa kun byed nyid la gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtogs pa kun byed nyid la gnas par 'gyur //
translated: all realization will abide in the all-creating one.

original: zhes gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is.

original: spyod pa blang dor med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o ////
analyzed: spyod pa blang dor med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o ////
translated: From the Tantra of the Great and Perfect Dynamic Energy of the Lion, this is chapter 6, the explanation of the all-creating mind as the ground of being.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos ye shes rang la sgrib pa med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos ye shes rang la sgrib pa med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating sovereign, enlightened mind, spoke of the realization that wisdom is unobstructed in itself:

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
translated: Kye! I am the teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch.

original: ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs su bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs su bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to demonstrate the methods for guiding beings,

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyi //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyi //
translated: I, the all-creating one, have taught that the three teachers who arise from me

original: sgrib pa bsal zhing ye shes bsgrub par rtogs //
analyzed: sgrib pa bsal zhing ye shes bsgrub par rtogs //
translated: are to be understood as the removal of obscurations and the attainment of wisdom.

original: sku gsum ston pas 'khor la de ltar bstan //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pas 'khor la de ltar bstan //
translated: The three teachers have thus taught their retinues,

original: 'khor gyis go zhing rtogs pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: 'khor gyis go zhing rtogs pa de bzhin te //
translated: and the retinues have understood and realized accordingly.

original: rang rang mos pa'i don la zhen pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang rang mos pa'i don la zhen pa'i phyir //
translated: Because they cling to the significance of their individual inclinations,

original: kun byed nga yi 'khor du 'du mi byed //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi 'khor du 'du mi byed //
translated: They do not gather in my retinue as the allcreating one.

original: kye / kun byed nga yis 'khor la lung phog pa //
analyzed: kye / kun byed nga yis 'khor la lung phog pa //
translated: O! I, the allcreating one, confer instructions to my retinue:

original: ji ltar snang grags gnas pa'i chos rnams kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang grags gnas pa'i chos rnams kun //
translated: All phenomena, however they appear, resound, or abide,

original: ma skyes de bzhin nyid du kun gcig phyir //
analyzed: ma skyes de bzhin nyid du kun gcig phyir //
translated: Are unoriginated and are all of one in suchness.

original: sgrib dang mi sgrib chos su gnas mi byed //
analyzed: sgrib dang mi sgrib chos su gnas mi byed //
translated: Do not abide in phenomena as being or not being obscured.

original: de phyir ye shes sgrib pa rang mi 'byed //
analyzed: de phyir ye shes sgrib pa rang mi 'byed //
translated: Therefore, do not make distinctions about whether timeless awareness is obscured or not.

original: @103b sgrib dang mi sgrib chos su ris mi lta //
analyzed: @103b sgrib dang mi sgrib chos su ris mi lta //
translated: Do not view phenomena as being or not being obscured.

original: mthar thug med pa'i don la grangs mi grangs //
analyzed: mthar thug med pa'i don la grangs mi grangs //
translated: Do not quantify the ultimate meaning, which is beyond any limit.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bus snying po'i don mi skyed //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bus snying po'i don mi skyed //
translated: The ultimate heart essence is not created by causes or results.

original: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga yi bka'//
analyzed: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga yi bka'//
translated: O! My words, the teacher, the allcreating monarch,

original: sku gsum ston pa'i lung dang mi mthun pas //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa'i lung dang mi mthun pas //
translated: Are not in accord with the transmission of the teacher of the three kayas.

original: skye med gcig la mtshan ma'i grangs mi bgrang //
analyzed: skye med gcig la mtshan ma'i grangs mi bgrang //
translated: Do not quantify the single unborn aspect in terms of characteristics.

original: yul shes mi blta gnyen po'i tshogs mi bsten //
analyzed: yul shes mi blta gnyen po'i tshogs mi bsten //
translated: Do not observe objects or consciousness, and do not rely on the accumulation of antidotes.

original: rig dang ma rig skye med dbyings gcig pas; ;gcig la gnyis 'dzin mtshan ma'i grangs mi 'debs //
analyzed: rig dang ma rig skye med dbyings gcig pas; ;gcig la gnyis 'dzin mtshan ma'i grangs mi 'debs //
translated: do not count the number of attributes, which is to apprehend duality in oneness.

original: rnam par mi rtog 'du shes nang mi 'jog /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog 'du shes nang mi 'jog /
translated: Do not settle into nonconceptual perception.

original: res 'jog ma yin dus gcig kun mkhyen pas //
analyzed: res 'jog ma yin dus gcig kun mkhyen pas //
translated: Do not alternate but know all at once.

original: de ltar sems dpa' rdo rjes rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: de ltar sems dpa' rdo rjes rtogs par gyis //
translated: Thus, O spiritual warrior, understand this.

original: kye / ston pa kun byed nga yi ye shes nyid //
analyzed: kye / ston pa kun byed nga yi ye shes nyid //
translated: O teacher, my, the all-creating one‚Äôs, timeless awareness

original: bgrang du med la bgrang na mtha' las 'das //
analyzed: bgrang du med la bgrang na mtha' las 'das //
translated: is not to be enumerated, but if it were, it would be beyond any limit.

original: che ba re la ye shes grangs bstan pas //
analyzed: che ba re la ye shes grangs bstan pas //
translated: In each of the great aspects, the number of aspects of timeless awareness is revealed,

original: brjod pas de dag mi rdzogs lung bstan to //
analyzed: brjod pas de dag mi rdzogs lung bstan to //
translated: but even if one were to speak of them, one would not finish, as is indicated in the scriptures.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi ye shes ni //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi ye shes ni //
translated: O my, the timeless awareness of me, the all-creating monarch,

original: rnam par mi rtog spros pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog spros pa kun dang bral //
translated: is nonconceptual, free of all elaboration,

original: rab zhi gdul med mkha' ltar gnas pa ste //
analyzed: rab zhi gdul med mkha' ltar gnas pa ste //
translated: utterly peaceful, uncontrived, and abiding like space,

original: skye ba med pa zhes su bstan pa yin //
analyzed: skye ba med pa zhes su bstan pa yin //
translated: so it is revealed to be unborn.

original: rang byung ye shes gcig las ma g-yos kyang //
analyzed: rang byung ye shes gcig las ma g-yos kyang //
translated: Without wavering from this single, naturally occurring timeless awareness,

original: rnam pa'i khyad par ma bcos so sor gsal //
analyzed: rnam pa'i khyad par ma bcos so sor gsal //
translated: the distinct aspects are distinctly evident, uncontrived.

original: de ltar gang gis rig cing rtogs pa nyid //
analyzed: de ltar gang gis rig cing rtogs pa nyid //
translated: Those who know and realize this

original: kun byed rgyal po'i sras su lung bstan to //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i sras su lung bstan to //
translated: I prophesy that you will be the heir of the all-creating monarch.

original: nga yi ye shes skye med rtogs pa ji ltar bar //
analyzed: nga yi ye shes skye med rtogs pa ji ltar bar //
translated: Just as I have realized the unborn timeless awareness,

original: sems dpa' rdo rjes de ltar rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rjes de ltar rtogs par gyis //
translated: so, Bodhisattva Vajra, you should realize it in the same way.

original: kye / nga ni ye shes kun byed rgyal po ste //üîΩma rig pa @104a *//
analyzed: kye / nga ni ye shes kun byed rgyal po ste // ma rig pa @104a *//
translated: O! I am the all-creating monarch of timeless awareness,

original: yi lta ba sel bar byed //
analyzed: yi lta ba sel bar byed //
translated: who clears away the views of nonrecognition.

original: sgrib pa'i dra ba ma lus gcod byed cing //
analyzed: sgrib pa'i dra ba ma lus gcod byed cing //
translated: I cut through the entire net of obscurations

original: ye shes snang ba rgyas par mched par byed //
analyzed: ye shes snang ba rgyas par mched par byed //
translated: and cause the light of timeless awareness to shine forth.

original: kun byed nga ni rang 'byung ye shes te //
analyzed: kun byed nga ni rang 'byung ye shes te //
translated: I, the all-creating one, am naturally occurring timeless awareness.

original: nga las ma byung rang 'byung ye shes gcig med pas //
analyzed: nga las ma byung rang 'byung ye shes gcig med pas //
translated: Since there is no timeless awareness that occurs without my having created it,

original: ye shes ma lus nga yis bkod pas na //
analyzed: ye shes ma lus nga yis bkod pas na //
translated: all timeless awareness is arrayed by me.

original: nga ni ye shes rgyal po zhes su bshad //
analyzed: nga ni ye shes rgyal po zhes su bshad //
translated: Therefore, I am explained to be the ‚Äútimeless monarch.‚Äù

original: nyon mongs ye shes gsal bar byed 'dod na //
analyzed: nyon mongs ye shes gsal bar byed 'dod na //
translated: If you wish to clarify afflictive emotions as timeless awareness,

original: kun byed nga yi lung ni rtogs par gyis //üîΩzhes gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: kun byed nga yi lung ni rtogs par gyis // zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: realize the transmission of me, the all-creating one.

original: ye shes sgrib pa med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: ye shes sgrib pa med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o ////
translated: This is the sixty-seventh chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the realization of timeless awareness free of obscuration.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lhun grub btsal du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lhun grub btsal du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, the all-creating mind of enlightenment, the King, taught this realization of spontaneous presence that is not sought:üîΩKYE! I am the teacher, the all-creating monarch,

original: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste; ;nga ni lhun grub btsal du med pa yin //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste; ;nga ni lhun grub btsal du med pa yin //
translated: I am spontaneous presence that is not sought.

original: nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya //
translated: I will reveal my nature to you.

original: khyod kyis nga yi don la legs rtogs shig /
analyzed: khyod kyis nga yi don la legs rtogs shig /
translated: You should realize the meaning of me.

original: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: KYE! I am the teacher, the all-creating monarch.

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
translated: The teachers who arise from me, the three kayas,

original: nga yi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' bas //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' bas //
translated: taught that my nature is extremely difficult to realize

original: so so'i thabs kyis btsal du yod par bstan //
analyzed: so so'i thabs kyis btsal du yod par bstan //
translated: and that it is to be sought through individual methods.

original: de yang ji ltar nges par bstan zhe na //
analyzed: de yang ji ltar nges par bstan zhe na //
translated: How is that definitely taught?

original: la la bden pa bzhi yi lam zhugs nas //
analyzed: la la bden pa bzhi yi lam zhugs nas //
translated: Some are taught to enter the path of the four truths

analyzed: nyon mongs ye shes spong len rtsol bar bstan //
translated: and to strive to abandon afflictions and adopt wisdom.

original: la la rten 'brel lam la zhen pa yis //
analyzed: la la rten 'brel lam la zhen pa yis //
translated: Some, attached to the path of interdependence,

analyzed: nyon mongs ye shes dgag sgrub rtsol @104b bar bstan //
translated: are taught to strive to block afflictions and achieve wisdom.

original: la la bden pa gnyis kyi lam la 'jug byas nas //
analyzed: la la bden pa gnyis kyi lam la 'jug byas nas //
translated: Some are taught to enter the path of the two truths

analyzed: sbyangs shing rtsol bas 'bras bu thob par bstan // la la gzung 'dzin bya ba'i rtsol ba yis //
translated: and attain the result through training and effort.üîΩSome assert that accomplishment exists in the way of

analyzed: grub pa lha gsal tshul du gnas par 'dod // la la las dang ting 'dzin rtsol ba yis //

analyzed: blang dor sgo nas 'bras bu thob par 'dod // la la ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum rtsol ba yis //
translated: activity and samadhi.üîΩSome assert that the result is attained through the

analyzed: blang dor byas pas 'bras bu thob par 'dod // la la ting 'dzin 'phro 'du'i rtsol ba yis //
translated: effort of the three samadhis by adopting and rejecting.üîΩSome assert that the result of nonadoption and nonüîΩrejection is attained through the effort of the emanation

original: blang dor med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod //
analyzed: blang dor med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod //

original: la la rgyu 'bras ting 'dzin rtsol ba yis //
analyzed: la la rgyu 'bras ting 'dzin rtsol ba yis //
translated: Some assert that the result of the vajra mind of the

analyzed: sku gsung rdo rje sems dpa'i 'bras bu thob //
translated: vajra body and speech is attained through the effort ofüîΩthe samadhi of cause and result.

original: kye / 'di dag btsal zhing bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu yis //
analyzed: kye / 'di dag btsal zhing bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu yis //
translated: Kye! The result of seeking and accomplishing these

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: will not realize my nature, the all-creating one.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin ni //
translated: Kye! My nature, the all-creating king,

original: kun la khyab kyang mi rtogs mchog tu gsang //
analyzed: kun la khyab kyang mi rtogs mchog tu gsang //
translated: Although it pervades everything, it is not realized. It is most secret.

original: nga yi rang bzhin ma mthong gsang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin ma mthong gsang ba'i phyir //
translated: Because my nature is not seen, it is secret.

original: rtsol sgrub can gyi theg pas skur btab pas //
analyzed: rtsol sgrub can gyi theg pas skur btab pas //
translated: Since it is disparaged by vehicles that involve effort and achievement,

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig yun ring du //
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig yun ring du //
translated: for a long time, for many quintillions of eons,

original: ngan 'gro tha ma'i gnas su de skyes nas //
analyzed: ngan 'gro tha ma'i gnas su de skyes nas //
translated: it is born in the final abode of the lower realms.

original: bde ba bral zhing dbang po ma tshang zhing //
analyzed: bde ba bral zhing dbang po ma tshang zhing //
translated: It is separated from bliss, has incomplete faculties,

original: snying po'i don dang bral zhing bskal par 'gyur //
analyzed: snying po'i don dang bral zhing bskal par 'gyur //
translated: and is separated from the meaning of the essence for an eon.

original: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems //
translated: Kye! I am the teacher, bodhicitta that does everything.

original: nga ni mtha' ltar yongs su khyab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nga ni mtha' ltar yongs su khyab pa'i phyir //
translated: Because I am completely pervasive, like the limits of space,

original: kun dang 'brel zhing yongs kyi don byed pas //
analyzed: kun dang 'brel zhing yongs kyi don byed pas //
translated: since I am connected with everything and perform the purpose of all,

original: btsal zhing bsgrub pa yod par lung mi ston //
analyzed: btsal zhing bsgrub pa yod par lung mi ston //
translated: I do not teach a transmission that exists to be sought and achieved.

original: nga yi don 'di khyod la bstan pa yis //üîΩbtsal zhing bsgrub @105a *//
analyzed: nga yi don 'di khyod la bstan pa yis // btsal zhing bsgrub @105a *//
translated: Since this meaning of mine is taught to you,

original: tu med par nges par rtogs //
analyzed: tu med par nges par rtogs //
translated: definitely realize that there is nothing to seek or achieve.

original: sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa de //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa de //

original: nga yi 'khor la khyod kyis lung ston cig /
analyzed: nga yi 'khor la khyod kyis lung ston cig /

original: kye / nga ni ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
translated: O! Because I am not sought but am spontaneously present,

original: ji ltar rtogs pa khyed la lung bstan pas //
analyzed: ji ltar rtogs pa khyed la lung bstan pas //
translated: I give you a prediction of realization just as it is.

original: khyed kyis chos kun pha ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyed kyis chos kun pha ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: You will realize all phenomena to be like a father.

original: de nas rtsol bsgrub med par dbugs phyin pas //
analyzed: de nas rtsol bsgrub med par dbugs phyin pas //
translated: Then, with a sigh of relief that there is no effort or achievement,

original: kun byed rgyal po nyid du lung bstan to //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nyid du lung bstan to //
translated: I give you a prediction of being the all-creating king.

original: de bas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa yis //
analyzed: de bas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa yis //
translated: Therefore, excellent being,

original: ma bcos bskal par sbyangs pa'i skyes bu la //
analyzed: ma bcos bskal par sbyangs pa'i skyes bu la //
translated: you who have trained for an eon without contrivance,

original: 'bad rtsol med par sa la bzhag pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'bad rtsol med par sa la bzhag pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to place you on the stage without effort or achievement,

original: btsal bsgrub med par rtogs par lung ston cig /
analyzed: btsal bsgrub med par rtogs par lung ston cig /
translated: give you a prediction of realization without effort or achievement.

original: ces gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is.üîΩFrom the Tantra of the Great and Perfect Dynamic Energy of the Lion, this is chapter 6, the explanation of the prediction of the spontaneous presence that is not sought.

original: lhun grub btsal du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu brgyad pa'o;; ;;de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bsgrags so //
analyzed: lhun grub btsal du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu brgyad pa'o;; ;;de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bsgrags so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajra Strength made the following proclamation to the all-creating king:

original: kye / khyod ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: kye / khyod ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: O! You are the all-creating king.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //

original: byed pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: byed pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis byas //

original: ma lus khyod kyis kun byas kyang //
analyzed: ma lus khyod kyis kun byas kyang //

original: byed pa'i rgyal po khyod nyid la //
analyzed: byed pa'i rgyal po khyod nyid la //

original: bya mi dgos te gdod nas grub //
analyzed: bya mi dgos te gdod nas grub //
translated: Do not need to do anything, for you are primordially accomplished.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas khyod kyis byas //

original: khams gsum sems can khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: khams gsum sems can khyod kyis byas //

original: rgyud drug lam lnga khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: rgyud drug lam lnga khyod kyis byas //

analyzed: skye bzhi 'gro lnga khyod kyis byas // ston pa gsum @105b yang khyod kyis bkod //

analyzed: bstan pa gsum yang khyod kyis bkod // sdud pa gsum yang khyod kyis bkod //
translated: You have also arranged the three teachings,üîΩYou have also arranged the three compilations,

original: dus gsum 'khor yang khyod kyis bkod //
analyzed: dus gsum 'khor yang khyod kyis bkod //

original: rang 'byung lnga yang khyod las byung //
analyzed: rang 'byung lnga yang khyod las byung //

original: rgyan gyi rgyu lnga khyod kyis bkod //
analyzed: rgyan gyi rgyu lnga khyod kyis bkod //

original: rang bzhin bcu yang khyod kyis bstan //
analyzed: rang bzhin bcu yang khyod kyis bstan //

original: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems //

original: mdo lung kun gyi ngo bo khyod //üîΩbstan pa'i me long mun sel sgron //
analyzed: mdo lung kun gyi ngo bo khyod // bstan pa'i me long mun sel sgron //
translated: You are the essence of all the sutras.üîΩThe mirror of the teachings, the lamp that dispels darkness,

original: 'khor gyi mun pa sel mdzad pa //
analyzed: 'khor gyi mun pa sel mdzad pa //
translated: You dispel the darkness of the retinue.

original: khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi mes //
analyzed: khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi mes //

original: rang 'byung thabs mchog kun gyi yab //
analyzed: rang 'byung thabs mchog kun gyi yab //
translated: You are the self-originated, supreme method, the father of all.

original: 'byung gnas shes rab kun gyi yum //
analyzed: 'byung gnas shes rab kun gyi yum //

original: spros pa med cing zhi ba med //
analyzed: spros pa med cing zhi ba med //

original: ngag las 'das shing snying po med //
analyzed: ngag las 'das shing snying po med //
translated: You are beyond speech and without essence.

original: mkha' ltar dag cing spyod yul 'das //
analyzed: mkha' ltar dag cing spyod yul 'das //

original: kun gyi rtogs par bya ba'i yul //
analyzed: kun gyi rtogs par bya ba'i yul //
translated: You are the object of realization of all.

original: sgro skur 'das pa chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: sgro skur 'das pa chos kyi dbyings //
translated: You are the dharmadhƒÅtu, beyond exaggeration and denigration.

original: thog ma tha ma dbus las 'das //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma dbus las 'das //

original: 'khor lo 'byung gnas snying po can //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'byung gnas snying po can //

original: rin chen padma'i snying po ltar //
analyzed: rin chen padma'i snying po ltar //

original: yid 'phrog tshim pa med pa'i sku //
analyzed: yid 'phrog tshim pa med pa'i sku //
translated: Your captivating form is never satiating.üîΩThe essence of the yƒÅna, the ornament of speech,

analyzed: theg pa'i snying po ngag gi rgyan; ;sku gsung thugs la mtshan med de //

analyzed: bdag gis rtogs dka'i don rtogs pas // rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po //
translated: Since I have realized the meaning that is difficult to realize,üîΩI bow to you, all-creating king,

original: kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud /
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud /
translated: The grandfather of all victors.

original: ces bstod cing bsgrags so //
analyzed: ces bstod cing bsgrags so //

analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bsgrags pa mdzad do //
translated: Vajra like this:üîΩ‚ÄúE MA HO!üîΩBodhisattva Vajra,

original: ae ma ho sems dpa' rdo rje'i sku //
analyzed: ae ma ho sems dpa' rdo rje'i sku //
translated: you have attained the body, speech, and mind

original: rgyal ba @106a *//üîΩkun gyi'ang sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: rgyal ba @106a *// kun gyi'ang sku gsung thugs //

analyzed: gsang ba'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes shing //

original: smra ba'i seng ge bla na med //
analyzed: smra ba'i seng ge bla na med //
translated: You are the unexcelled lion of speech.

original: dam pa'i gsang ba rtogs pa'i thugs //
analyzed: dam pa'i gsang ba rtogs pa'i thugs //

original: gsang ba rgya mtsho sgrogs pa'i gsung //
analyzed: gsang ba rgya mtsho sgrogs pa'i gsung //

original: yon tan lhun grub rdzogs pa'i sku //
analyzed: yon tan lhun grub rdzogs pa'i sku //

original: khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras po ste //
analyzed: khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras po ste //

original: kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ltar //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ltar //
translated: Just like me, the All-Creating King,

original: rgyal ba kun gyi mes po gyis //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi mes po gyis //
translated: be the grandfather of all the victorious ones.

original: sa khams rnams kyi mun sel gyis //
analyzed: sa khams rnams kyi mun sel gyis //
translated: Clear away the darkness of the earth.

original: rnal 'byor rnams kyi bla ma gyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams kyi bla ma gyis //

original: gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po ste //
analyzed: gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po ste //
translated: You are the king of all secrets.

original: bstan pa phyi ma gsang ba 'di //
analyzed: bstan pa phyi ma gsang ba 'di //
translated: Give the prediction of this secret

original: rnal 'byor pa la lung ston cig /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la lung ston cig /
translated: later teaching to the yogic practitioners.üîΩThis is the chapter on the prediction of the later teaching, the

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: secret.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: This is the twenty-first chapter of The All-Creating Monarch,üîΩthe chapter on the prediction of the later teaching, the secret.

original: rtogs pa bsgrags shing bstod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: rtogs pa bsgrags shing bstod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
translated: This is the sixty-ninth chapter of The All-Creating Sovereign, Mind of Perfect Purity, in which is proclaimed the praise of realization.

original: rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba mdo lung bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba mdo lung bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The Tantra of the Later Transmission is complete.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa la gzigs shing dgongs nas cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa la gzigs shing dgongs nas cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
translated: Then, the all-creating mind of perfect purity, the sovereign, having seen and contemplated the sameness of the unborn nature of all phenomena, remained silent.

original: de'i tshe sems dpa' rdo rje de nyid kyang ston ba de ltar gyur pa yang rig /
analyzed: de'i tshe sems dpa' rdo rje de nyid kyang ston ba de ltar gyur pa yang rig /

analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pa la dgongs nas cang yang mi smra bar 'khod do //
translated: contemplated the realization of the unborn nature of all phenomena, and remained silent.

original: de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags shing 'khod pa'i 'dus pa phal mo che dag gis de ltar rtogs nas sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bskul lo //üîΩyang dag par bskul to //
analyzed: de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags shing 'khod pa'i 'dus pa phal mo che dag gis de ltar rtogs nas sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bskul lo // yang dag par bskul to //
translated: Then, the majority of the assembly who had gathered from the ten directions, having realized this, exhorted the bodhisattva Vajra:üîΩ‚ÄúExhort!

original: nges pa dam par bskul to //
analyzed: nges pa dam par bskul to //
translated: Exhort with the highest certainty!

original: ae ma ho: sems dpa' rdo rje chen po bdag cag @106b la sman gdags pa'i slad du rtogs ba'i don la ji ltar bsgom pa de ston pa la zhu ba'i dus la bab bo //
analyzed: ae ma ho: sems dpa' rdo rje chen po bdag cag @106b la sman gdags pa'i slad du rtogs ba'i don la ji ltar bsgom pa de ston pa la zhu ba'i dus la bab bo //
translated: The time has come for the great being Vajra to teach us how to meditate on the meaning of realization in order to benefit us.

original: nges par dus la bab bo zhes bskul bas sems dpa' rdo rje de dga' ba'i mdangs dang bcas te dang zhing mos pa'i mdangs phyung nas stan las langs te ston pa'i mdun du 'di skad ces zhus so //
analyzed: nges par dus la bab bo zhes bskul bas sems dpa' rdo rje de dga' ba'i mdangs dang bcas te dang zhing mos pa'i mdangs phyung nas stan las langs te ston pa'i mdun du 'di skad ces zhus so //
translated: Since he was urged, The time has definitely come, the being Vajra, with a joyful radiance, brought forth the radiance of faith and devotion, rose from his seat, and in the presence of the teacher he made this request:

original: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: Kye! Teacher of teachers, all-creating king,

original: khyod kyi mdun du bdag 'khod de //
analyzed: khyod kyi mdun du bdag 'khod de //
translated: I am seated in your presence.

original: bdag 'tshal ba yi don ni ci zhig mchis //
analyzed: bdag 'tshal ba yi don ni ci zhig mchis //

original: bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol //
analyzed: bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol //
translated: Please teach me the meaning of my request.üîΩIn response to this request, all-creating mind itself remained silent.

original: zhes zhus pa las byang chub kyi sems kun byed nyid cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs te sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so //
analyzed: zhes zhus pa las byang chub kyi sems kun byed nyid cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs te sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so //
translated: The being Vajra made this request:

original: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: Kye! Teacher of teachers, all-creating king,

original: chos sku skye med thig le'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: chos sku skye med thig le'i rang bzhin la //
translated: In the unborn dharmakƒÅya, the nature of the sphere,

original: ston pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom //üîΩbstan pa gsum du nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom //
analyzed: ston pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom // bstan pa gsum du nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom //
translated: how do the three teachers meditate?üîΩHow do they meditate on the three teachings?

original: sdud pa gsum du nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom //
analyzed: sdud pa gsum du nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom //

original: 'khor gnas dus kyi rang bzhin ji ltar bsgom //
analyzed: 'khor gnas dus kyi rang bzhin ji ltar bsgom //
translated: How do they meditate on the nature of retinue, place, and time?

original: chos rnams kun gyi don la ji ltar bsgom //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi don la ji ltar bsgom //

original: bsgom pa'i lung bcu bdag la bstan du gsol //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lung bcu bdag la bstan du gsol //
translated: Please teach me the ten transmissions of meditation.‚Äù

original: zhes zhus so //
analyzed: zhes zhus so //
translated: Thus he requested.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so //
translated: Then the mind of all-creating Samantabhadra said this:

original: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje don la nga bsgoms shig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje don la nga bsgoms shig /
translated: ‚ÄúOh Bodhisattva Vajra, meditate on the meaning of me.

original: bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la //
analyzed: bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la //
translated: In enlightenment, the dharmatƒÅ that is not meditated,

original: sgom dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis med na //
analyzed: sgom dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis med na //
translated: since meditation and the meditator are nondual,

original: ma bsgoms rang bzhin bzhag na bsgom pa yin //
analyzed: ma bsgoms rang bzhin bzhag na bsgom pa yin //
translated: if the unmeditated nature is settled, that is meditation.

original: don ni kun don skye ba med pa ste //
analyzed: don ni kun don skye ba med pa ste //
translated: The meaning is the unborn meaning of all.

original: rnam rtog mtshan ma de bzhin rig byas nas //
analyzed: rnam rtog mtshan ma de bzhin rig byas nas //

original: dran bsam yid la rgyu ba ma lus kun //
analyzed: dran bsam yid la rgyu ba ma lus kun //
translated: all movements of thought and memory

original: skye ba med pa'i @107a *//
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i @107a *//
translated: NonarisingüîΩ

original: ngang las ma yengs pa //
analyzed: ngang las ma yengs pa //
translated: Without wavering from the unborn realm,

original: gang ltar bsam kyang sgom pa yin shes na //
analyzed: gang ltar bsam kyang sgom pa yin shes na //

analyzed: ma bsgom gang ltar bzhag kyang yengs pa med //
translated: there is no distraction, no matter what arises, even if you are not meditating.

analyzed: kye; nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis // mtshan ma bsgom la dga' ba'i gang zag la // rang rang gang ltar 'thad pa'i lung bzhin du //

analyzed: bsgom du yod ces kun la lung du bstan //

original: kye; nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po la //
analyzed: kye; nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po la //

analyzed: ston pa rang 'byung rig pa'i ye shes las // ma bsdus ston pa gsum yang de la 'dus //

analyzed: bstan pa gsum yang de la 'dus te gnas //

analyzed: gzhal yas gsum yang de la 'dus par bshad //

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //

original: snying po byang chub sems la kun 'dus pas //
analyzed: snying po byang chub sems la kun 'dus pas //

analyzed: 'khor gsum dus gsum kun tu 'dus par bshad //

analyzed: ma bsdus rang bzhin 'du ba'i ye shes ni //

original: sdud pa de las gzhan pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: sdud pa de las gzhan pa yod ma yin //

original: ma bsgom rang bzhin bzhag pa'i lung 'di la //
analyzed: ma bsgom rang bzhin bzhag pa'i lung 'di la //
