analyzed: bsgom du yong dang med pa'i lung mi ston //
translated: no transmission is given concerning whether there is meditation or not.

original: re dogs sgro skur 'dzin pa'i sems mi 'jog /üîΩces gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: re dogs sgro skur 'dzin pa'i sems mi 'jog / ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: The mind that reifies with value judgments and exaggeration and denigration is not posited.

original: bsgom du yod med bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o ////
analyzed: bsgom du yod med bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o ////
translated: This is the seventy-first chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining whether or not there is meditation.üîΩChapter 72: The Transmission of the View

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lta ba sgom med kyi dgongs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lta ba sgom med kyi dgongs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, gave this teaching on the transcendent state of nonmeditation:

original: kye; nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: kye; nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: I, the all-creating monarch, am the teacher.

original: de las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //üîΩmtshan ma rtog pas @107b 'dul ba'i gang zag la //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis // mtshan ma rtog pas @107b 'dul ba'i gang zag la //
translated: The teachers of the three kayas, who arise from me,üîΩhave revealed the enumeration of samƒÅdhis involving conceptual characteristics

original: mtshan ma rtog pa'i ting 'dzin grangs su bstan //
analyzed: mtshan ma rtog pa'i ting 'dzin grangs su bstan //
translated: to those who are to be guided by means of conceptual characteristics.

original: la las zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom par byed //
analyzed: la las zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom par byed //
translated: Some cultivate the meditative absorption of peace,

original: la las zab mo'i ting 'dzin sgom par byed //üîΩla las zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel ba yi //
analyzed: la las zab mo'i ting 'dzin sgom par byed // la las zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel ba yi //
translated: And some cultivate the meditative absorption of profundity.üîΩSome abide in the meditative absorption of selflessness,

original: bdag med ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
analyzed: bdag med ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
translated: Which is the union of ≈õamatha and vipa≈õyanƒÅ.

original: la la mtshan ma dag pa la brten nas //
analyzed: la la mtshan ma dag pa la brten nas //
translated: Some, based on the purity of signs,

original: mtshan ma rje dang 'bangs su dmigs par byed //
analyzed: mtshan ma rje dang 'bangs su dmigs par byed //
translated: Cultivate the meditative absorption of the master and the subject.

original: la la lta spyod 'brel med la brten nas //
analyzed: la la lta spyod 'brel med la brten nas //
translated: Some, based on the nonconnection of view and conduct,

original: 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
analyzed: 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
translated: Abide in the meditative absorption of connection.

original: la la mtshan med don la brten byas shing //
analyzed: la la mtshan med don la brten byas shing //
translated: Some, based on the meaning of signlessness,

original: mtshan ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
translated: Abide in the meditative absorption of signs.

original: la las rang rgyud dag pa la brten nas //
analyzed: la las rang rgyud dag pa la brten nas //
translated: Some, based on the purity of their own mind streams,

original: rnam gsum 'phro 'du'i don la gnas par byed //
analyzed: rnam gsum 'phro 'du'i don la gnas par byed //
translated: Abide in the meaning of the emanation and gathering of the three.

original: la la rgyu 'bras dag pa gtsor byas nas //
analyzed: la la rgyu 'bras dag pa gtsor byas nas //
translated: Some, emphasizing the purity of cause and result,

original: 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
analyzed: 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
translated: Abide in the meditative absorption of light.

original: 'di dag mtshan ma grangs kyi ting 'dzin te //
analyzed: 'di dag mtshan ma grangs kyi ting 'dzin te //
translated: These are the meditative absorptions of signs and enumeration,

original: ston pa kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan //
analyzed: ston pa kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan //
translated: Not prophesied by me, the all-creating Teacher.

original: kye; ston pa kun byed nga yis lung bstan pa //
analyzed: kye; ston pa kun byed nga yis lung bstan pa //
translated: Ah! I, the teacher, the all-creating one, have proclaimed

original: ma lus skye med rnam dag ting 'dzin te //
analyzed: ma lus skye med rnam dag ting 'dzin te //
translated: The samƒÅdhi of the unborn purity of everything,

original: bsgom dang mi sgoms rkyen la rag ma lus //
analyzed: bsgom dang mi sgoms rkyen la rag ma lus //
translated: Without depending on conditions, whether meditating or not.

original: bsgom bya ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
analyzed: bsgom bya ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
translated: All phenomena, which are what is to be meditated upon,

original: gang du ji ltar bzhag pa'i tshul med par //
analyzed: gang du ji ltar bzhag pa'i tshul med par //
translated: Are not to be posited in any way whatsoever.

original: ma btsal rang sar bzhag pas bsgoms pa yin //
analyzed: ma btsal rang sar bzhag pas bsgoms pa yin //
translated: Since they are unsearched for and left in their own place, they are meditated upon.

original: kye; bsgom du med pa'i man ngag 'di dag la //
analyzed: kye; bsgom du med pa'i man ngag 'di dag la //
translated: Ah! Since these intimate instructions on the absence of meditation

original: tshig dang sgra las 'das pa'i don yin phyir //üîΩsnga rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan //
analyzed: tshig dang sgra las 'das pa'i don yin phyir // snga rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan //
translated: Are topics that transcend words and sounds,üîΩThe all-creating king of the past did not proclaim them.

original: phyi rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung mi ston //
analyzed: phyi rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung mi ston //
translated: The all-creating king of the future will not proclaim them.

original: da ltar kun byed rgyal pos lung bstan med //
analyzed: da ltar kun byed rgyal pos lung bstan med //
translated: The all-creating king of the present does not proclaim them.

original: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //üîΩma nor dgongs pa'i don la lung bstan pa //
analyzed: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis // ma nor dgongs pa'i don la lung bstan pa //
translated: Ah! The teacher of teachers, the all-creating king,üîΩProclaims the meaning of the unerring transcendent state

original: sgro skur 'das pa don gyi snying po la //
analyzed: sgro skur 'das pa don gyi snying po la //
translated: In the ultimate heart essence, beyond exaggeration and denigration,

original: bsgom dang mi sgom mkha' la rtsod pa 'dra //
analyzed: bsgom dang mi sgom mkha' la rtsod pa 'dra //
translated: Meditation and nonmeditation are like arguing about space.

original: rtogs pa'i don la ma yengs dgongs pa ste //üîΩdngos po ma @108a *//
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don la ma yengs dgongs pa ste // dngos po ma @108a *//
translated: The transcendent state is to be undistracted from the meaning of realization.

original: yin dngos po med ma yin //
analyzed: yin dngos po med ma yin //
translated: It is not an entity and is not a nonentity.

original: phyogs min phyogs las 'das pa ma yin par //
analyzed: phyogs min phyogs las 'das pa ma yin par //
translated: It is not a position and is not beyond positions.

original: bsgom dang mi sgom phyogs la gnas mi byed //
analyzed: bsgom dang mi sgom phyogs la gnas mi byed //
translated: Do not abide in the position of meditating or not meditating.

original: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
analyzed: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
translated: Ky√©! I, the all-creating monarch, the teacher of teachers,

original: bsgom dang mi sgom mtshon par mi nus ltar //
analyzed: bsgom dang mi sgom mtshon par mi nus ltar //
translated: cannot be characterized as either meditation or nonmeditation.üîΩThe bodhisattva vajras who abide in the meaning of the essence

original: snying po don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang // sems dpa' rdo rje de la gnas par bya //
analyzed: snying po don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang // sems dpa' rdo rje de la gnas par bya //
translated: should abide in that.

original: kye; dus gsum ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye; dus gsum ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ky√©! The all-creating monarch, teacher of the three times,

original: skye med byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa la //üîΩming dang tha snyad tshig tu 'di'o zhes //
analyzed: skye med byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa la // ming dang tha snyad tshig tu 'di'o zhes //
translated: in the transcendent state of nonarising bodhicitta

original: ma bstan mi ston bstan par mi mdzad do //
analyzed: ma bstan mi ston bstan par mi mdzad do //
translated: has not shown, does not show, and will not showüîΩwith words, terms, and labels, ‚ÄúIt is this.‚Äù

original: lta ba bsgom du med par don rtogs na //
analyzed: lta ba bsgom du med par don rtogs na //
translated: When the meaning of the view is realized to be nonmeditation,

original: bsgom dang mi bsgom res 'jog log pa'i lam //
analyzed: bsgom dang mi bsgom res 'jog log pa'i lam //
translated: the path of error is the alternation of meditating and not meditating.

original: dam pa'i dgongs pa skye med thugs chud na //
analyzed: dam pa'i dgongs pa skye med thugs chud na //
translated: When the transcendent state of the sacred one is realized to be nonarising,

original: dam pa de la log dang ma log med //
analyzed: dam pa de la log dang ma log med //
translated: there is neither error nor nonerror in that sacred one.

original: kye; kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung phog ltar //
analyzed: kye; kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung phog ltar //
translated: O! I, the all-creating monarch, have proclaimed this transmission.üîΩHaving realized and become familiar with nonmeditation,

original: ma bsgoms bsgom du med par rtogs goms nas //
analyzed: ma bsgoms bsgom du med par rtogs goms nas //
translated: the absence of meditation,

original: skal ldan rnal 'byor gang zag su yang rung //
analyzed: skal ldan rnal 'byor gang zag su yang rung //
translated: any fortunate one, any individual yogin,

original: kun byed rgyal po nyid du lung bstan to //üîΩzhes gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nyid du lung bstan to // zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: is prophesied to be the all-creating monarch.

original: lta sgom dbyer med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: lta sgom dbyer med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o ////
translated: This is the seventy-first chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, the mind of enlightenment, in which the view and meditation are inseparable.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bsrung du med pa de bzhin nyid du gnas pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bsrung du med pa de bzhin nyid du gnas pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, the mind of enlightenment, spoke of abiding in the suchness that is not to be guarded:

original: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: The teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: rnam rtog mtshan ma'i lam la gnas pa'i bar //
analyzed: rnam rtog mtshan ma'i lam la gnas pa'i bar //
translated: has said that those who abide on the path of conceptual characteristics

original: bsrung dang mi srung khyad par gnyis mthong ba //
analyzed: bsrung dang mi srung khyad par gnyis mthong ba //
translated: see a difference between what is to be guarded and what is not.

original: rtsa ba yan lag bcas par bsrung bar bsten //
analyzed: rtsa ba yan lag bcas par bsrung bar bsten //
translated: They rely on guarding the root and the branches.

original: kye; kun byed nga ni ye nas de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: kye; kun byed nga ni ye nas de bzhin nyid //
translated: Kye! I, the all-creating one, am timelessly suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid la gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir //
translated: Since suchness is nondual, there is nothing to be guarded.

original: chos rnams de ltar gang gis rtogs pa la //
analyzed: chos rnams de ltar gang gis rtogs pa la //
translated: Those who realize that phenomena are like that

original: bsrung dang mi srung 'du shes 'jug pa med //
analyzed: bsrung dang mi srung 'du shes 'jug pa med //
translated: do not engage in the notion of observing or not observing.

original: kye; nga ni ma bcos kun byed @108b byang chub sems //
analyzed: kye; nga ni ma bcos kun byed @108b byang chub sems //
translated: ‚ÄúO! I am the uncontrived, all-creating mind of enlightenment.

original: gnyen po mi bsten yul la 'jug mi byed //
analyzed: gnyen po mi bsten yul la 'jug mi byed //
translated: I do not rely on antidotes and do not engage in objects.

original: rang 'byung lhun grub rig pa'i dam chig la //
analyzed: rang 'byung lhun grub rig pa'i dam chig la //
translated: In the pledge of awareness, which is self-originated and spontaneously present,

original: 'da' nyams med pas ched du bsrung ba med //
analyzed: 'da' nyams med pas ched du bsrung ba med //
translated: there is no transgression or degeneration, so there is nothing to observe.

original: rang rig ma nor blo yi tshad ma yis //
analyzed: rang rig ma nor blo yi tshad ma yis //
translated: With the unerring awareness of one‚Äôs mind as the valid cognition,

original: ma bcos snying po'i don la 'jug par byed //
analyzed: ma bcos snying po'i don la 'jug par byed //
translated: one engages the meaning of the uncontrived heart essence.

original: skye med thugs su chos kun ro gcig pas //
analyzed: skye med thugs su chos kun ro gcig pas //
translated: Since all phenomena are of one taste in the unborn mind,

original: 'jug dang mi 'jug mtha' la nga mi gnas //
analyzed: 'jug dang mi 'jug mtha' la nga mi gnas //
translated: I do not abide in the extremes of engagement or nonengagement.

original: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje don la goms par gyis //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje don la goms par gyis //
translated: ‚ÄúO! Be familiar with the ultimate meaning, O spiritual warrior.

original: dgongs don gsang pa'i rig pa ma shar na //üîΩtshig dang sgra la 'dzin /
analyzed: dgongs don gsang pa'i rig pa ma shar na // tshig dang sgra la 'dzin /
translated: If the secret meaning of the transcendent state does not dawn,

original: ba'i goms pa dag /
analyzed: ba'i goms pa dag /
translated: those who are familiar with the retention of words and sounds

original: kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: will not encounter the transmission of me, the all-creating one.

original: bsrung du med pa'i dam pa'i dgongs pa 'di //
analyzed: bsrung du med pa'i dam pa'i dgongs pa 'di //
translated: This sacred enlightened intent, which is not to be observed,

original: kun tu ye nas ma bsrungs gnas pa la //
analyzed: kun tu ye nas ma bsrungs gnas pa la //
translated: is timelessly and all-pervasively present without being observed.

original: kun byed nga yi dgongs pa ma goms na //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi dgongs pa ma goms na //
translated: If you are not familiar with the transcendent state of me, the all-creating one,

original: ji ltar bsrungs pa tshi chad nad du 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar bsrungs pa tshi chad nad du 'gyur //
translated: then however much you guard it, it will become a disease that cuts off life.

original: kye; kun byed nga yi dgongs pa'i dam tshig ni //
analyzed: kye; kun byed nga yi dgongs pa'i dam tshig ni //
translated: Ky√©! The sacred samaya of my, the all-creating one‚Äôs, transcendent state

original: ma yengs dran pas dngos po ye shes su //
analyzed: ma yengs dran pas dngos po ye shes su //
translated: is that the nondistraction of mindfulness is pristine consciousness in entities.

original: ma bcos sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste //
analyzed: ma bcos sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste //
translated: Unfabricated, not created by anyone, self-originated,

original: rig pas dbang bsgyur bsrung dang mi srung med //
analyzed: rig pas dbang bsgyur bsrung dang mi srung med //
translated: and mastered by vidyƒÅ, there is nothing to guard or not guard.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: All phenomena, however they appear,

original: rang 'byung snying por gsal bas dbang bsgyur bas //
analyzed: rang 'byung snying por gsal bas dbang bsgyur bas //
translated: are mastered by being illuminated as the self-originated essence.

original: kun byed rgyal pos byas ba'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal pos byas ba'i chos rnams la //
translated: The phenomena created by the all-creating king

original: rig dang ma rig gnyis ka'i yul las 'das //
analyzed: rig dang ma rig gnyis ka'i yul las 'das //
translated: are beyond the domain of both vidyƒÅ and ignorance.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ky√©! The teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: bsrung dang mi srung yul las 'das pa ltar //
analyzed: bsrung dang mi srung yul las 'das pa ltar //
translated: is beyond the domain of guarding and not guarding.

original: sems dpa' rdo rjes don la goms byas nas //üîΩnga yis 'khor la de ltar lung ston cig //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rjes don la goms byas nas // nga yis 'khor la de ltar lung ston cig //
translated: Semenpa Vajra, having become familiar with the meaning,üîΩprophesy to the retinue in that way.

original: nga yi 'khor la de ltar lung bstan na //
analyzed: nga yi 'khor la de ltar lung bstan na //
translated: If you prophesy to the retinue in that way,

original: bya ba'i 'du shes lam las grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bya ba'i 'du shes lam las grol bar 'gyur //
translated: The perception of action will be free from the path.

original: skye ba med pas kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skye ba med pas kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur //
translated: Since there is no origination, everything will be peace.

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yis thugs su 'gyur //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yis thugs su 'gyur //
translated: It will be integrated within me, the all-creating king.

original: kye; nga ni kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems //
analyzed: kye; nga ni kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems //
translated: Ky√©! I am the all-creating king, awakened mind.

original: nga la sgro dang skur ba'i yul med byas //
analyzed: nga la sgro dang skur ba'i yul med byas //
translated: I am beyond the domain of exaggeration and denigration.

original: gang la sems par ma byed bsgom ma byed //
analyzed: gang la sems par ma byed bsgom ma byed //
translated: Do not think about me, and do not meditate.

original: sgo @109a *// gsum bcos par mi bya lhug par bzhag /
analyzed: sgo @109a *// gsum bcos par mi bya lhug par bzhag /
translated: Do not contrive with the three doors, but rest loosely.

original: gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs dus tshod med //
analyzed: gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs dus tshod med //
translated: There are no planets, lunar mansions, dates, or times.

original: yid la mi byed sngags dang phyag rgya bral //
analyzed: yid la mi byed sngags dang phyag rgya bral //
translated: There is no mental engagement, and there are no mantras or mudras.

original: de bas kun byed byang chub sems nyid la //
analyzed: de bas kun byed byang chub sems nyid la //
translated: Therefore, within the very mind of the all-creating one,

original: bsrung dang mi srung sa mtshams med par bshad //
analyzed: bsrung dang mi srung sa mtshams med par bshad //
translated: it is explained that there is no boundary between what is to be guarded and what is not.

original: ces gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is.

original: lta bsgom 'dar med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: lta bsgom 'dar med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: From The All-Creating Monarch, the tantra of the mind of perfect purity, this completes the seventy-second chapter: the view and meditation that do not waver.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bya med rtsol ba dang bral bar rtogs pa 'di gsungs so //üîΩkye; nga ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bya med rtsol ba dang bral bar rtogs pa 'di gsungs so // kye; nga ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: Then, the all-creating mind of awakening, the all-creating sovereign, spoke this realization, free of action and effort:üîΩKYE! I am the all-creating monarch.

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni //
translated: The transcendent state of me, the all-creating monarch,

original: bsam pa'i yul las 'das pas bsgom du med //
analyzed: bsam pa'i yul las 'das pas bsgom du med //
translated: is not meditation, for it transcends the domain of thought.

original: kye / sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste //
analyzed: kye / sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste //
translated: KYE! Mind is the essence of the way things are.

original: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong //
translated: I have never fabricated the way things are.

original: rang 'byung nga la rgyu rkyen kun dang bral //
analyzed: rang 'byung nga la rgyu rkyen kun dang bral //
translated: I, self-arisen one, am free of all causes and conditions.

original: sgo gsum btsal med lhug pa nyid du zhog /
analyzed: sgo gsum btsal med lhug pa nyid du zhog /
translated: Rest in the unfabricated relaxation of the three doors.

original: gang zhig bya rtsol mtshan ma'i rjes 'brangs pa //
analyzed: gang zhig bya rtsol mtshan ma'i rjes 'brangs pa //
translated: Those who follow with effort the signs of activity

original: kun byed nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun byed nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not meet me, the all-creating one.

original: kye / ston pa'i kun byed nga yi phrin las ni //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i kun byed nga yi phrin las ni //
translated: KYE! My activity as the all-creating teacher

original: bya ba med pas rtsol ba'i las mi byed //
analyzed: bya ba med pas rtsol ba'i las mi byed //
translated: is not done with effort, for there is nothing to do.

original: dmigs pa med pas bsgom pa'i 'du shes bral //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pas bsgom pa'i 'du shes bral //
translated: I am free of the perception of meditation, for there is no reference point.

original: 'du 'brel med pas ma brjed yid la zhog /
analyzed: 'du 'brel med pas ma brjed yid la zhog /
translated: I am not forgotten, for there is no connection.

original: byung tshor skye ba med pas gsal 'gyur nas //
analyzed: byung tshor skye ba med pas gsal 'gyur nas //
translated: Since there is no arising of thoughts, there is clarity.

original: gang yang byas pa med par las @109b kun grub //
analyzed: gang yang byas pa med par las @109b kun grub //
translated: Without anything being done, all activities are accomplished.

original: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: O! I am the teacher, the all-creating monarch.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las ngas byas kyang //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las ngas byas kyang //
translated: Although I perform the activity of all victorious ones,

original: rang 'byung ye shes bya med rdzogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes bya med rdzogs pa'i phyir //
translated: because self-originated gnosis is perfect without anything being done,üîΩI have never engaged in activity that accords with the way things are.

original: ji bzhin pa yi las la byed ma myong; ;ma btsal ji bzhin nyid du sems dpa' zhog /
analyzed: ji bzhin pa yi las la byed ma myong; ;ma btsal ji bzhin nyid du sems dpa' zhog /
translated: Rest in the mind that is uncontrived and just as it is, without being sought.

original: ji bzhin ma bcos rgyal ba'i dgongs pa la //
analyzed: ji bzhin ma bcos rgyal ba'i dgongs pa la //
translated: In the enlightened intent of victorious ones, which is just as it is, uncontrived,

original: sems dang sems las byung ba ci skyes kyang //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba ci skyes kyang //
translated: no matter what arises in the mind or what manifests from the mind,

original: de nyid skye med nyid du gnas shes na //
analyzed: de nyid skye med nyid du gnas shes na //
translated: if one knows that this abides in the unborn nature itself,

original: bya rtsol mtshan ma'i 'du shes kun dang bral //
analyzed: bya rtsol mtshan ma'i 'du shes kun dang bral //
translated: one is free of all deliberate effort and dualistic perception.üîΩO!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
translated: Semenpa Vajra, meditate on the way things really are.

original: rtogs pa rang sar grol ba'i lta ba la //
analyzed: rtogs pa rang sar grol ba'i lta ba la //
translated: In the view in which realization is freed in its own place,

original: ma yengs rang bzhin bzhag pas bya btsal med //
analyzed: ma yengs rang bzhin bzhag pas bya btsal med //
translated: by resting naturally without distraction, there is no deliberate effort.

original: kun kyang rang 'byung rang sar grol ba yin //
analyzed: kun kyang rang 'byung rang sar grol ba yin //
translated: Everything is self-originated and free in its own place.üîΩO!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
translated: Semenpa Vajra, meditate on the way things really are.

original: rang lus mi bcos dbang po mi rtul te //
analyzed: rang lus mi bcos dbang po mi rtul te //

original: ngag kyang mi gdams bya rtsol byar yang med //
analyzed: ngag kyang mi gdams bya rtsol byar yang med //

original: sems kyang gang gtad mi g-yo'i ngang la bzhag /
analyzed: sems kyang gang gtad mi g-yo'i ngang la bzhag /
translated: Do not focus your mind, but rest in a state of unwavering openness.

original: bya ba med pa'i phrin las 'di bsgoms pas //
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i phrin las 'di bsgoms pas //

original: byas pa med par don kun rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: byas pa med par don kun rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: All goals are accomplished without anything needing to be done.

original: kye / ji bzhin rtsol bral bde ba chen po la //
analyzed: kye / ji bzhin rtsol bral bde ba chen po la //

original: sgo gsum mi rtsol bcos shing dmigs mi byed //
analyzed: sgo gsum mi rtsol bcos shing dmigs mi byed //
translated: Do not strive with your three doors, do not contrive, and do not focus.

original: yid la mi byed mtshan ma'i rjes mi 'brangs //
analyzed: yid la mi byed mtshan ma'i rjes mi 'brangs //

original: rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i don la bzhag /
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i don la bzhag /

original: 'di ni rang 'byung 'od gsal dgongs pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni rang 'byung 'od gsal dgongs pa ste //

original: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i phrin las so //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i phrin las so //
translated: The activity of enlightened intent as the all-creating monarch.

original: kye / sems dpa' @110a *//
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' @110a *//
translated: O,üîΩheroic being!üîΩ

original: rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
analyzed: rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /

original: ma bcos ji bzhin nyid la 'jug ba la //
analyzed: ma bcos ji bzhin nyid la 'jug ba la //

original: tshad ma mi dgos gnyen pos bcos mi dgos //
analyzed: tshad ma mi dgos gnyen pos bcos mi dgos //

analyzed: rtogs pa'i don la ma bcos de bzhin zhog /

original: kye / bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin las 'di la //
analyzed: kye / bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin las 'di la //

analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa la gnas pas //

analyzed: nga yi dgongs pa phrin las lhun gyis grub //

analyzed: ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /

analyzed: ji bzhin pa la bya rtsol dang bral bar gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gsum pa'o ////
translated: This is the seventy-third chapter, on abiding in the way of being just as it is, free of anything needing to be done.üîΩChapter 74üîΩThe Way of Abiding without Straying from the Heart Essence

analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos snying po 'du 'bral med par gnas pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the enlightened mind of all-creating royal presence taught this to be the way of abiding without straying from the heart essence:üîΩO! In the way of abiding just as it is, the spiritual warrior

original: kye / ji bzhin pa la sems dpa' rdo rje sgom //
analyzed: kye / ji bzhin pa la sems dpa' rdo rje sgom //
translated: Vajra Mind

original: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //

analyzed: ji bzhin gtso 'khor med pa'i don du bstan //

analyzed: da ltar bzhugs pa'i kun byed rgyal pos kyang // dgongs pa rnal du bzhag te gnas @111a *//

analyzed: pa yin // kye /

analyzed: nga yi 'khor du gtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //

analyzed: dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pa'i don 'di ni //

analyzed: kun byed rgyal po de la gnas par byed //

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /

analyzed: snying po don la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu bzhi pa'o ////
translated: The Heart Essence of Abiding in the Ultimate Meaning.

analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rig pa dbang sgyur la gnas pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, enlightened mind, spoke thus to awareness, sovereign of all:

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /

analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal pos gsal bar dbang bsgyur nas //

analyzed: rtogs nas mi rtog don la ji bzhin zhog /

analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po dbang thob rig pa na //

analyzed: dngos po ma bcos ji bzhin rtag tu shar //

analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen med zhi ba mchog gi lam //

analyzed: gzhi bzhag gang ltar bzhag kyang de nyid dang // kun byed rgyal po thabs chen rtogs pa'i dbang //
translated: The mastery of realizing the all-creating monarch, the greater scope,

original: kun kyang ji bzhin yul la 'jug pa na //
analyzed: kun kyang ji bzhin yul la 'jug pa na //
translated: is such that everything engages its object just as it is.

original: skyon dang yon tan gnyi ga mnyam shes nas //
analyzed: skyon dang yon tan gnyi ga mnyam shes nas //

analyzed: 'jug dang mi 'jug tshig @111b las shin tu 'das //

analyzed: kye / kun byed rig pas dbang bsgyur dgongs pa 'di //

original: ngag gis smrang med dmigs pa'i yul las 'das //
analyzed: ngag gis smrang med dmigs pa'i yul las 'das //
translated: is not expressed verbally, for it transcends any frame of reference.

original: dran pa zhi zhing spros pa med pa ste //
analyzed: dran pa zhi zhing spros pa med pa ste //
translated: It is a state of peace, without elaboration.

original: mkha' ltar khyab cing phyogs cha yongs kyis med //
analyzed: mkha' ltar khyab cing phyogs cha yongs kyis med //
translated: It pervades everything, like space, and is not defined by extremes or the middle.

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje de bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje de bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
translated: O Great and Courageous One, meditate on suchness, the way things really are.

original: bsgom dang mi sgom yul las 'das pa la //
analyzed: bsgom dang mi sgom yul las 'das pa la //
translated: Beyond the domain of meditation and nonmeditation,

translated: neither arising nor engaging, free of hope and fear,üîΩdo not rest in equipoise, and do not meditate on the ultimate meaning.

original: dbang dang dngos grub mi len bcos su med //
analyzed: dbang dang dngos grub mi len bcos su med //

original: kun byed rgyal po nyid la gus par gnas //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nyid la gus par gnas //

original: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni //
analyzed: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni //

original: rang 'byung sgom du med pa'i snying po ste //
analyzed: rang 'byung sgom du med pa'i snying po ste //

original: ye shes gsal la sgrub pa med pa yin //
analyzed: ye shes gsal la sgrub pa med pa yin //
translated: I am timeless awareness, lucid and without accomplishment.

original: dbang ni rtogs pas re dogs bcad pa yin //
analyzed: dbang ni rtogs pas re dogs bcad pa yin //

original: 'di la nges par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: 'di la nges par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogic practitioner who definitely engages in this

analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i lung //
translated: is a most excellent yogic practitioner, one who has received the transmission that transcends causality.

original: ma bcos ye shes kun byed rgyal po la //
analyzed: ma bcos ye shes kun byed rgyal po la //
translated: The uncontrived timeless awareness of the all-creating monarch

original: gang ltar 'di ltar 'jog ces lung mi ston //
analyzed: gang ltar 'di ltar 'jog ces lung mi ston //
translated: cannot be pointed out as some ‚Äúthing‚Äù to be posited in such a way.

analyzed: snga bar ma gsungs phyis kyang mi gsung zhing //

original: da ltar byung bar gsungs par mi mdzad do //
analyzed: da ltar byung bar gsungs par mi mdzad do //
translated: It is not taught to be something that occurs in the present.

original: kye / ston pa'i ngo bo kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ngo bo kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: O teacher, the essence of all things, the all-creating monarch,

original: bsgom zhing bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la //
analyzed: bsgom zhing bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la //
translated: has not taught that the nature of phenomena, which cannot be cultivated or imagined,

original: ma bsams yal bar gnas pas 'khor ba nyid //
analyzed: ma bsams yal bar gnas pas 'khor ba nyid //
translated: is samsara, which is to abide in a carefree state without thinking.

original: btsal zhing bsgoms pas rtog pa'i mtshan ma'i lam //
analyzed: btsal zhing bsgoms pas rtog pa'i mtshan ma'i lam //
translated: The path of conceptual characteristics is sought and cultivated.üîΩTherefore, the all-creating one does not teach that

original: de bas re dogs bcas pa'i ting 'dzin ni //
analyzed: de bas re dogs bcas pa'i ting 'dzin ni //

analyzed: rig pa dbang bsgyur la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu lnga pa'o ////
translated: The Explanation of the Ultimate Meaning of the Heart Essence

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos snying po don gyi lam 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos snying po don gyi lam 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating sovereign, mind of perfect purity, spoke these words concerning the ultimate meaning of the heart essence:üîΩKye!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don la nga bsgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don la nga bsgoms shig /
translated: Bodhisattva Vajra, meditate on me, the ultimate meaning.

original: snying po mi rtogs don gyi lam 'di la //
analyzed: snying po mi rtogs don gyi lam 'di la //
translated: In this ultimate path, the heart essence that cannot be realized,

original: nam mkha' mtha' ltar gnas pas ma khyab med //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' ltar gnas pas ma khyab med //
translated: there is nothing that is not pervaded by the expanse of space, which is limitless.

original: skye med min pa med pas mi sgom med //
analyzed: skye med min pa med pas mi sgom med //
translated: There is nothing that is not meditated upon, for there is nothing that is not unborn.

original: rtog dpyod yul las 'das pas dmigs su med //
analyzed: rtog dpyod yul las 'das pas dmigs su med //
translated: There is nothing to be focused on, for this is beyond the domain of conceptual analysis.

original: snying po mtshan ma 'das pa'i yul 'di la //
analyzed: snying po mtshan ma 'das pa'i yul 'di la //
translated: In this domain of the heart essence, beyond characterization,

original: bgrod pa'i yul las 'das @112b pas bgrod ma byed //
analyzed: bgrod pa'i yul las 'das @112b pas bgrod ma byed //
translated: there is no destination, for it is beyond any destination.

original: lam la mi bgrod sa la mi sbyong zhing //
analyzed: lam la mi bgrod sa la mi sbyong zhing //
translated: There is no traveling on a path, no training on a stage,

original: mi rtog bde la gnas pas lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: mi rtog bde la gnas pas lhun gyis grub //
translated: And so, with spontaneous presence, one abides in bliss that is beyond imagination.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam nyid ni //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam nyid ni //
translated: O! My, the sovereign all-creating one, my path

original: chos kyi dbyings su gcig pas bgrod du med //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su gcig pas bgrod du med //
translated: Is indivisible within the basic space of phenomena, so there is no destination.

original: snying po don dang 'grogs pas yengs pa med //
analyzed: snying po don dang 'grogs pas yengs pa med //
translated: Since it is accompanied by the ultimate heart essence, there is no distraction.

original: thig le gcig tu 'dus pas gar mi 'gro /
analyzed: thig le gcig tu 'dus pas gar mi 'gro /
translated: Since everything is subsumed in the single sphere, there is nowhere to go.

original: kye / de yi don la sems dpa' rdo rje sgom //
analyzed: kye / de yi don la sems dpa' rdo rje sgom //
translated: O! The spiritual warrior Vajra Mind meditates on that ultimate meaning.

original: bsgom du med pa'i don la ma bsgoms na //
analyzed: bsgom du med pa'i don la ma bsgoms na //
translated: If he does not meditate on the ultimate meaning, which is beyond meditation,

original: mtshan ma'i grangs la bskal pa brgyar bsgoms kyang //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i grangs la bskal pa brgyar bsgoms kyang //
translated: even if he meditates for a hundred eons on the basis of quantified attributes,

original: kun byed nga yi dgongs pa rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi dgongs pa rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: he will not realize the intent of me, the all-creating one.

original: rnam rtog yul la mtshan ma'i grangs las 'das //
analyzed: rnam rtog yul la mtshan ma'i grangs las 'das //
translated: The objects of conceptualization are beyond the scope of quantified attributes.

original: kun byed bya mi dgos la byar yang med //üîΩbya ba mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor rjes zhugs shing //
analyzed: kun byed bya mi dgos la byar yang med // bya ba mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor rjes zhugs shing //
translated: I, the all-creating one, am not something that needs to be done, nor is there anything that needs to be done.

original: bya bas mi zin rtog pas rtog pa 'jil //
analyzed: bya bas mi zin rtog pas rtog pa 'jil //
translated: The yoga of action based on attributes is a pursuit that is not embraced by action, and so conceptualization is destroyed by conceptualization.

original: chu las rnyog ma bzhin te byis pas bslus //
analyzed: chu las rnyog ma bzhin te byis pas bslus //

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don la legs par sgoms //
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje don la legs par sgoms //
translated: O! The spiritual warrior Vajra Mind meditates perfectly on ultimate meaning.

original: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //

original: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi lam 'dren pas //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi lam 'dren pas //

analyzed: khyod kyang nga yi lam la legs par zhugs // 'das pa'i sangs rgyas skye med lam du zhugs //
translated: You, too, have properly entered my path.üîΩBuddhas of the past entered the unborn path.

original: ma byon skye med lam la 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma byon skye med lam la 'jug par 'gyur //

original: da ltar sangs rgyas skye med nyid la gnas //
analyzed: da ltar sangs rgyas skye med nyid la gnas //

original: des na kun byed rgyal po kun gyi lam //
analyzed: des na kun byed rgyal po kun gyi lam //
translated: Therefore, the all-creating monarch is the path of all.üîΩAh!

original: kye / lam 'dir 'jug cing bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: kye / lam 'dir 'jug cing bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
translated: Yogins and yoginƒ´s who enter and meditate on this path

original: da lta nyid nas rgyal ba'i sa la gnas //
analyzed: da lta nyid nas rgyal ba'i sa la gnas //
translated: Abide in the state of victorious ones in the very moment.

original: dgongs @113a *// pa mi 'dzin phyogs ris gzung du med //
analyzed: dgongs @113a *// pa mi 'dzin phyogs ris gzung du med //

analyzed: snying po'i lam la 'jug dang mi 'jug 'das //
translated: The path of the heart essence is beyond being entered or not.üîΩAh!üîΩFortunate ones who enter the yoga of the single moment,

analyzed: kye / rnal 'byor dus gcig 'jug pa'i skal ldan la; ;kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa bstan byas nas //

analyzed: rtogs pa'i rlung la dran zhing 'dris pa las //

original: ma lus kun byas byang chub sems su byas //
analyzed: ma lus kun byas byang chub sems su byas //

original: sems nyid skye ba med pa'i lam du byas //
analyzed: sems nyid skye ba med pa'i lam du byas //

original: skye med bde ba'i lam la 'jug tu med //
analyzed: skye med bde ba'i lam la 'jug tu med //

original: skal ldan rgyal sras dam par nges pa la //
analyzed: skal ldan rgyal sras dam par nges pa la //
translated: For the fortunate ones, the sublime heirs of the victorious ones,

original: kun byed nga yi lam 'di goms byas nas //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi lam 'di goms byas nas //
translated: once they have become familiar with this path of mine, all-creating,

original: bgrod med rtsal med snying po'i don rtogs nas //
analyzed: bgrod med rtsal med snying po'i don rtogs nas //
translated: they will realize the ultimate meaning of the heart essence, without journeying or applying effort,

original: kun byed rgyal po nyid du the tshom med; ;ces gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las //üîΩsnying po lam la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu drug pa'o ////
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nyid du the tshom med; ;ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las // snying po lam la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu drug pa'o ////

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos don la spyad du med pa 'di gsungs so //üîΩkye / sems dpa' rdo rje rtogs pa'i don la sgoms //üîΩston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //üîΩbsam gyis mi khyab nges pa'i dus bstan pa //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos don la spyad du med pa 'di gsungs so //üîΩkye / sems dpa' rdo rje rtogs pa'i don la sgoms //üîΩston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //üîΩbsam gyis mi khyab nges pa'i dus bstan pa //
translated: This is the seventy-sixth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the chapter on abiding in the path of the heart essence.

original: bde chen nges pa'i dus su gang bstan pa //
analyzed: bde chen nges pa'i dus su gang bstan pa //

original: de ni goms pa'i sa zhes @113b bshad pa yin //
analyzed: de ni goms pa'i sa zhes @113b bshad pa yin //
translated: Is explained to be the bh≈´mi of familiarity.

original: gzhan dag rtsol zhing spyod pa'i khyad par dag /
analyzed: gzhan dag rtsol zhing spyod pa'i khyad par dag /
translated: The distinctions of effort and activity of others

analyzed: khams gsum 'khor ba'i snying po bsgribs pa'i sa //
translated: Are the bh≈´mis that obscure the heart essence of sa·πÉsƒÅra‚Äôs three realms.

analyzed: sa zhes bya ba gnas pa'i khyad par te //
translated: The term ‚Äúbh≈´mi‚Äù refers to distinctions of abiding,

original: gang la gang gnas de ni sa yin no //
analyzed: gang la gang gnas de ni sa yin no //
translated: And whatever abides somewhere is a bh≈´mi.

original: kyee / sku gsum ston pa'i sa la grangs bgrangs kyang //
analyzed: kyee / sku gsum ston pa'i sa la grangs bgrangs kyang //
translated: Although the Teacher of the three kƒÅyas enumerates the bh≈´mis,

analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i sa la rim pa med //
translated: There are no levels on the stage of the all-creating monarch.

original: sa dang sa yi rim pa'i khyad par yod //
analyzed: sa dang sa yi rim pa'i khyad par yod //

original: ces pa sku gsum ston pas 'khor la bstan pa yin //
analyzed: ces pa sku gsum ston pas 'khor la bstan pa yin //
translated: This is the teaching of the Teacher of the three kƒÅyas to his retinue.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ky√©! The Teacher of the Teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: mnyam nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: mnyam nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
translated: In the nature of nonarising, uniform evenness,

original: thabs dang snying po rtogs pa'i gang zag gis //
analyzed: thabs dang snying po rtogs pa'i gang zag gis //
translated: Has revealed to individuals who realize the methods and the heart essence

original: sgrib dang sa yi khyad par med par bstan //
analyzed: sgrib dang sa yi khyad par med par bstan //

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin ni //

original: dus gsum 'byung 'jug mi byed yid la byed pa med //
analyzed: dus gsum 'byung 'jug mi byed yid la byed pa med //
translated: is not made to arise or enter in the three times, and so there is no mental activity.

original: ris su mi lta mtshan ma'i yul mi tshol //
analyzed: ris su mi lta mtshan ma'i yul mi tshol //
translated: It is not viewed in terms of bias, and the domain of characteristics is not sought.

original: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i lung du bstan //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i lung du bstan //
translated: This is revealed in the transmission of the transcendent state of the all-creating king.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni //üîΩtshig dang yi ges mtshon pa mi rnyed cing //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni // tshig dang yi ges mtshon pa mi rnyed cing //
translated: O! The transcendent state of me, the all-creating king,üîΩcannot be found by demonstrating it with words and syllables.

original: sgra dang tshad mas gtan la dbab du med //
analyzed: sgra dang tshad mas gtan la dbab du med //

original: skye ba med pas 'gag pa med pa yin //
analyzed: skye ba med pas 'gag pa med pa yin //

original: 'phel ba med cing yongs su 'grib mi byed //
analyzed: 'phel ba med cing yongs su 'grib mi byed //

original: mtshan ma min zhing de nyid min pa'ang min; ;kye /
analyzed: mtshan ma min zhing de nyid min pa'ang min; ;kye /

original: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
analyzed: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
translated: O! I, the teacher of teachers, the all-creating king,

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: bless all phenomena, however they appear,

original: skye ba med pa'i ngo bor byin brlabs pas //üîΩrtogs pas de @114a *//
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i ngo bor byin brlabs pas // rtogs pas de @114a *//
translated: to be the essence of nonarising.

original: nyid ngang du ldog par 'gyur //
analyzed: nyid ngang du ldog par 'gyur //
translated: Through realization, they will return to that state.

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yi byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yi byin rlabs kyis //
translated: Through my blessing, the all-creating one,

original: sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa ltar //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa ltar //
translated: Just as the bodhisattva Vajra realized it,

original: phyi rabs kun byed lung la dad pa la; ;dngos po skye ba med par byin rlobs shig /
analyzed: phyi rabs kun byed lung la dad pa la; ;dngos po skye ba med par byin rlobs shig /
translated: Bless those of future generations who have faith in the transmission of the all-creating one

original: de ltar sgom du med pa'i snying po la //
analyzed: de ltar sgom du med pa'i snying po la //
translated: So that things are realized to be unborn.üîΩThe essence that is not to be cultivated

original: ma yengs dran pas bzung ba man ngag yin //
analyzed: ma yengs dran pas bzung ba man ngag yin //
translated: Is the intimate instruction for being held by undistracted mindfulness.üîΩThis all-creating king, awakened mind,

original: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems 'di la; ;bshad pas ma yin tshigs su bcad pas min //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems 'di la; ;bshad pas ma yin tshigs su bcad pas min //

original: bsgom pas ma yin ma bsgoms pas kyang min //
analyzed: bsgom pas ma yin ma bsgoms pas kyang min //

original: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya kun las 'das //
analyzed: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya kun las 'das //

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yis bstan pa'i sa //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yis bstan pa'i sa //
translated: Ky√©! In the teaching of me, the all-creating king,

original: ma lus 'di la brten pas spong len med //
analyzed: ma lus 'di la brten pas spong len med //
translated: Without depending on anything, there is no adopting or rejecting.

original: phyogs cha med par khyab pas che chung med //
analyzed: phyogs cha med par khyab pas che chung med //
translated: Since there is no bias, there is no large or small.

original: chos kyi dbyings su gnas pas rtog dang mi rtog med; ;de phyir dus gcig gnas pa'i sa 'di la //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su gnas pas rtog dang mi rtog med; ;de phyir dus gcig gnas pa'i sa 'di la //
translated: Since it abides in the basic space of phenomena, there is no thought or nonthought.üîΩTherefore, bodhisattva Vajra,

original: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par gnas par gyis /üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par gnas par gyis /üîΩzhes gsungs so //
translated: Abide well in this single basic space.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: This is the seventy-seventh chapter of The All-Creating Sovereign, the mind of enlightenment,üîΩcalled ‚ÄúThe Ultimate Meaning of Nonmeditation.‚ÄùüîΩCHAPTER 78

original: don la sbyang med kyi le'u ste bdun cu bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: don la sbyang med kyi le'u ste bdun cu bdun pa'o ////
translated: The Absence of Acceptance and Rejection in Evenness
