analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mnyam pa la blang dor med pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating sovereign, the mind of enlightenment, spoke these words concerning the enlightened intent in which there is no acceptance or rejection in evenness:üîΩKye!

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //üîΩskye med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis // skye med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la //
translated: The all-creating sovereign, the teacher of teachers,üîΩhas not revealed that there is acceptance or rejectionüîΩin the enlightened intent of abiding

original: ji bzhin ma bcos gnas pa'i dgongs pa la //üîΩblang dang dor @114b ba yod par lung ma bstan //
analyzed: ji bzhin ma bcos gnas pa'i dgongs pa la // blang dang dor @114b ba yod par lung ma bstan //
translated: in the uncontrived way things are‚Äîthe nature of unborn mind of enlightenment.

original: skye med rang bzhin sgros skur bral ba ste //
analyzed: skye med rang bzhin sgros skur bral ba ste //
translated: The unborn nature is free of value judgments.

original: blang dang dor ba sgro skur don tu bstan //
analyzed: blang dang dor ba sgro skur don tu bstan //
translated: Acceptance and rejection are revealed to be value judgments.

original: su zhig snying po'i don la zhugs pa yis //
analyzed: su zhig snying po'i don la zhugs pa yis //
translated: Anyone who is immersed in the ultimate meaning of the heart essence

original: sgro skur 'das pa snying po'i don du bstan //
analyzed: sgro skur 'das pa snying po'i don du bstan //
translated: is revealed to be immersed in the ultimate meaning that transcends value judgments.

original: gang yang bsam pa kun las 'das byed pa //
analyzed: gang yang bsam pa kun las 'das byed pa //
translated: Anyone who transcends all conceptual frameworks

original: blang dor med par rtogs par lung bstan to //
analyzed: blang dor med par rtogs par lung bstan to //
translated: is revealed to be enlightened without acceptance or rejection.üîΩKye!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje snying po'i don la sgoms //
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje snying po'i don la sgoms //
translated: Meditate on the ultimate meaning of the heart essence, O courageous being.

original: nga ni ma nor don gyi snying po la //
analyzed: nga ni ma nor don gyi snying po la //
translated: I am the unerring heart essence of reality.

original: blang dor rnam rtog bcos pa'i yul med do //
analyzed: blang dor rnam rtog bcos pa'i yul med do //
translated: There is no object to be contrived through the concepts of acceptance and rejection.

original: rang bzhag bde ba mchog gis goms par byed //
analyzed: rang bzhag bde ba mchog gis goms par byed //
translated: I am familiar with the supreme bliss of resting naturally.

original: kun byed rtogs na snying por kun gnas pas //
analyzed: kun byed rtogs na snying por kun gnas pas //
translated: If you realize me, the all-creating one, everything abides in the heart essence,

original: snying po'i don la blang dor lung ma bstan //
analyzed: snying po'i don la blang dor lung ma bstan //
translated: so in the meaning of the heart essence, I do not teach any acceptance or rejection.

original: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos su'ang lung ma bstan //
analyzed: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos su'ang lung ma bstan //
translated: I do not teach that it is subject to origination and destruction.

original: bzang ngan gtsang sme'i chos su'ang lung ma bstan //
analyzed: bzang ngan gtsang sme'i chos su'ang lung ma bstan //
translated: I do not teach that it is subject to good and bad, clean and dirty.

original: rtog dpyod bsam pa'i yul las 'das par bstan //
analyzed: rtog dpyod bsam pa'i yul las 'das par bstan //
translated: I teach that it is beyond the domain of conceptual analysis.

original: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje nges par da sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje nges par da sgoms shig /
translated: O Se≈à¬≠dharma, you should definitely meditate on this!

original: bsgom dang bsgom par bya ba'i yul nyid ni //
analyzed: bsgom dang bsgom par bya ba'i yul nyid ni //
translated: The object of meditation and the meditatorüîΩare beyond the domain of the mind that meditates or does not meditate

original: ma bcos kun byed sems kyi rang bzhin la //üîΩbsgom dang mi sgom blo yi yul las 'das //
analyzed: ma bcos kun byed sems kyi rang bzhin la // bsgom dang mi sgom blo yi yul las 'das //
translated: in the uncontrived nature of mind, the all-creating one.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni //üîΩnga yi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni // nga yi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la //
translated: I, the all-creating monarch, awakened mind,üîΩdo not teach any phenomenon to be accepted or rejected

original: blang dang dor ba'i chos nyid nga mi ston //
analyzed: blang dang dor ba'i chos nyid nga mi ston //
translated: to the hosts gathered in my retinue.

original: gcig la gnyis su dbye ba'i chos mi ston //
analyzed: gcig la gnyis su dbye ba'i chos mi ston //
translated: I do not teach a phenomenon that can be divided into two in one.

original: rtog dang dpyod 'das rtog dpyod bsam mi byed //
analyzed: rtog dang dpyod 'das rtog dpyod bsam mi byed //
translated: Beyond imagination and analysis, do not think in terms of imagination and analysis.

original: ma gcos ji bzhin pa la 'chos ma byed //
analyzed: ma gcos ji bzhin pa la 'chos ma byed //
translated: Do not contrive what is uncontrived, just as it is.

original: bya ba gang btang ci snang chos nyid la //üîΩma bsams rang bzhin bzhag @115a *//
analyzed: bya ba gang btang ci snang chos nyid la // ma bsams rang bzhin bzhag @115a *//
translated: Whatever activities are abandoned, whatever appears is the nature of phenomena.

original: pas grol bar ston //
analyzed: pas grol bar ston //
translated: It is taught that by resting naturally without thinking, there is freedom.

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje chen po da sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje chen po da sgoms shig /
translated: O great and courageous one, now meditate!

original: blang dor med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la //
analyzed: blang dor med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la //
translated: In enlightenment, the nature of phenomena, which is beyond acceptance and rejection,

original: mkha' ltar gnas pas lus sems bcos su med //
analyzed: mkha' ltar gnas pas lus sems bcos su med //
translated: like space, there is no contrivance of body or mind.

original: 'du shes zhen 'dzin med pas bsgom du med //
analyzed: 'du shes zhen 'dzin med pas bsgom du med //
translated: Since there is no conceptual clinging, there is no meditation.

original: mkha' ltar rab zhi rnyog pa kun bral la //
analyzed: mkha' ltar rab zhi rnyog pa kun bral la //
translated: Like space, completely peaceful and free from all disturbance,

original: yul la mi 'jug dgongs pa'i dmigs 'jug bral //
analyzed: yul la mi 'jug dgongs pa'i dmigs 'jug bral //
translated: there is no engagement with objects, and there is freedom from the focus of enlightened intent.

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da bsgoms shig /üîΩdbang po yul la mi rtog sems mi sdud //
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da bsgoms shig / dbang po yul la mi rtog sems mi sdud //
translated: O great and courageous one, now meditate well!üîΩWithout conceptualizing the sense faculties and their objects, do not focus the mind.

original: gnyen po mi brten lus sems rgyud ma sbyongs //
analyzed: gnyen po mi brten lus sems rgyud ma sbyongs //
translated: Do not rely on antidotes, and do not purify the continuum of body and mind.

original: lus sems ma bcos snying po'i don du rtogs //
analyzed: lus sems ma bcos snying po'i don du rtogs //
translated: Understand that the uncontrived body and mind is the ultimate heart essence.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi spyod pa ni //üîΩma btsal lhug par gnas pas don kun rdzogs //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal po nga yi spyod pa ni // ma btsal lhug par gnas pas don kun rdzogs //
translated: Ah! My conduct, the all-creating monarch,üîΩis not sought, but is relaxed, so that all goals are accomplished.

original: snying po'i don du 'dus pas blang dor med //
analyzed: snying po'i don du 'dus pas blang dor med //
translated: Since it is subsumed in the ultimate meaning, there is no acceptance or rejection.

original: re dogs rnam par chad pas mya ngan 'das mi sgom //
analyzed: re dogs rnam par chad pas mya ngan 'das mi sgom //
translated: Since hope and fear are totally eliminated, nirvana is not cultivated.

original: kun byed nga yi spyod pa gang rtogs pas //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi spyod pa gang rtogs pas //
translated: Whoever realizes my conduct, all-creating activity,

original: dus gsum skye med don du mnyam pa la //
analyzed: dus gsum skye med don du mnyam pa la //
translated: in the ultimate meaning, the unborn nature of the three times,

original: 'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das //üîΩ'di ni blang dor med par lung bstan to //
analyzed: 'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das // 'di ni blang dor med par lung bstan to //
translated: is utterly beyond the words ‚Äúto enter‚Äù or ‚Äúnot to enter.‚Äù

original: zhes gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: This is the prophecy that there is no acceptance or rejection.üîΩThis is the seventy-eighth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, the tantra of the Great Perfection.

original: mnyam pa la blang dor med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: mnyam pa la blang dor med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o ////
translated: Chapter 79üîΩThe Inexhaustibility of the Three VajrasüîΩThen the all-creating monarch, bodhichitta, spoke this mind, the enlightened intent in which there is no obscuration to clear away in the naturally occurring heart essence:

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rang 'byung snying po'i ngang la sgrib pa bsal du med pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs @115b so; ;kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rang 'byung snying po'i ngang la sgrib pa bsal du med pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs @115b so; ;kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ah! The teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: snying po sgrib med dgongs par lung bstan pa //
analyzed: snying po sgrib med dgongs par lung bstan pa //
translated: I prophesy that the unobscured heart essence is enlightened intent.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa //
translated: All phenomena, without exception, just as they appear,

original: skye med chos kyi dbyings su kun gcig pas //
analyzed: skye med chos kyi dbyings su kun gcig pas //
translated: are one within the unborn basic space of phenomena.

original: skye med snying po thugs kyi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: skye med snying po thugs kyi rang bzhin la //
translated: In the unborn heart essence, the nature of the enlightened mind,

original: sgrib pa mi sgrib khyad par bstan pa med //
analyzed: sgrib pa mi sgrib khyad par bstan pa med //
translated: there is no question of whether or not there is obscuration.

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nga sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nga sgoms shig /
translated: O great and courageous one, contemplate me properly!

original: skye med chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa la //
analyzed: skye med chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa la //
translated: In the oneness of all phenomena within the unborn basic space of phenomena,

original: sgrib dang mi sgrib spong len gang 'dod pa //
analyzed: sgrib dang mi sgrib spong len gang 'dod pa //
translated: any attempt to renounce or acquire, whether or not there is obscuration,

original: dam pa'i snying po'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dam pa'i snying po'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur //
translated: is in conflict with the ultimate meaning of the sacred heart essence.

original: kun byed byang chub sems kyis lung bstan pa //
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems kyis lung bstan pa //
translated: I, the all-creating one, make this proclamation:

original: skye med bsgoms pas skye ba snying por gsal //
analyzed: skye med bsgoms pas skye ba snying por gsal //
translated: By meditating on the unborn, the essence of birth is revealed.

original: mkha' ltar rtog dpyod 'das la gang gnas pas //
analyzed: mkha' ltar rtog dpyod 'das la gang gnas pas //
translated: Whoever abides in the sky-like nature beyond imagination or scrutiny

original: sgrib dang mi sgrib byang chub sems su gnas //
analyzed: sgrib dang mi sgrib byang chub sems su gnas //
translated: abides in the enlightened mind, whether or not there is obscuration.

original: kye / kun byed rgyal pos 'khor la lung bstan pa //
analyzed: kye / kun byed rgyal pos 'khor la lung bstan pa //
translated: The all-creating monarch proclaims to the retinue:

original: ye shes sgrib med gsal ba'i don du bstan //
analyzed: ye shes sgrib med gsal ba'i don du bstan //
translated: I reveal this to make evident the unobstructed state of timeless awareness.

original: rang 'byung rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying por gnas //
analyzed: rang 'byung rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying por gnas //
translated: It abides as the heart essence that is not subject to any independent origination.

original: rtogs pas sgro skur 'das pa'i dgongs pa yin //
analyzed: rtogs pas sgro skur 'das pa'i dgongs pa yin //
translated: This is the enlightened intent that transcends exaggeration and denigration through realization.

original: kye / de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje da sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje da sgoms shig /
translated: O great and courageous one, meditate now on this!

original: rang 'byung ye shes dmigs pa kun las 'das //üîΩrtogs pa dmigs pa'i don du gzhog mi byed //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes dmigs pa kun las 'das // rtogs pa dmigs pa'i don du gzhog mi byed //
translated: Self-originating timeless awareness is beyond all reference points.üîΩDo not bring realization down to the level of a reference point.

original: yul las 'das pas rnam shes srung mi byed //
analyzed: yul las 'das pas rnam shes srung mi byed //
translated: Since it is beyond objects, do not try to protect consciousness.

original: dngos po snying por gsal bas sgom mi byed //
analyzed: dngos po snying por gsal bas sgom mi byed //
translated: Since the essence of things is clearly evident, do not meditate.

original: rnam pa snying por gsal bas re dogs med //
analyzed: rnam pa snying por gsal bas re dogs med //
translated: Since the essence of manifestations is clearly evident, do not hope or fear.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //üîΩma bcos @116a *//
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis // ma bcos @116a *//
translated: O teacher, the teacher, the all-creating monarch,

original: 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa //
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa //
translated: has made the following prediction in the midst of his retinue:

original: ma bcos snying po ches kun rtsol ba la //
analyzed: ma bcos snying po ches kun rtsol ba la //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the heart essence of uncontrivance,

original: ji ltar snang ba gtan la 'bebs par byed //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba gtan la 'bebs par byed //
translated: the way in which things manifest is confirmed.

original: snying po rang bzhin gcig gi don rtogs na //
analyzed: snying po rang bzhin gcig gi don rtogs na //
translated: When the significance of the oneness of the heart essence is realized,

original: kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed nyid du 'dus //
analyzed: kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed nyid du 'dus //
translated: the nature of everything is subsumed within the all-creating one.

original: des na kun byed nga yi don mkhas na //
analyzed: des na kun byed nga yi don mkhas na //
translated: Therefore, if one is skilled in the significance of me, the all-creating one,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mkhas par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mkhas par 'gyur //
translated: They will become learned in the inconceivable Dharma.

original: kun byed nga yi don la goms gyur na //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi don la goms gyur na //
translated: If you are familiar with the meaning of me, the all-creating one,

original: kun gyi don la gnas shing goms pa yin //
analyzed: kun gyi don la gnas shing goms pa yin //
translated: you are familiar with and abide in the meaning of everything.

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
translated: O Se≈à¬≠dharma, listen properly now!

original: ji ltar snang grags chos rnams thams cad la //
analyzed: ji ltar snang grags chos rnams thams cad la //
translated: In all phenomena, whatever appears and resounds,

original: snying po rtogs goms don nyid gcig las med //
analyzed: snying po rtogs goms don nyid gcig las med //
translated: there is no meaning other than the single meaning of realizing and being familiar with the essence.

original: snying po mngon du phyung nas gang bstan pa //
analyzed: snying po mngon du phyung nas gang bstan pa //
translated: Having brought the essence into the manifest,

original: rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i don du rtogs //
analyzed: rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i don du rtogs //
translated: realize that the meaning is the unborn nature.

original: ma yengs re dogs chad pas dgongs pa yin; ;kye /
analyzed: ma yengs re dogs chad pas dgongs pa yin; ;kye /
translated: The transcendent state is to be undistracted, with no hope or fear.

original: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
translated: O Se≈à¬≠dharma, listen properly now!

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos su gang bstan pa //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos su gang bstan pa //
translated: Whatever is taught as a phenomenon that appears

original: kun byed rgyal po mtshon pa'i thabs su bstan //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po mtshon pa'i thabs su bstan //
translated: is taught as a method to illustrate the all-creating king.

original: thabs de'i lung dang 'gal bar ma byed cig /
analyzed: thabs de'i lung dang 'gal bar ma byed cig /
translated: Do not contradict the transmission of that method.

original: kun byed nga yi sras su zhugs rnams kyis //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi sras su zhugs rnams kyis //
translated: All who enter as my heirs, the all-creating one,

original: kun kyang skye med don du rtogs 'gyur na //
analyzed: kun kyang skye med don du rtogs 'gyur na //
translated: will realize that everything is the meaning of the unborn.

original: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par mi sems te //
analyzed: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par mi sems te //
translated: Do not think of samsara and do not think of nirvana.

original: snying po rang bzhin rtogs dpyod bral bar bstan //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: snying po rang bzhin rtogs dpyod bral bar bstan // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The heart essence is shown to be the nature free of conceptual elaboration.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: This completes the seventy-ninth chapter of The All-Creating Sovereign, Mind of Perfect Purity, in which the nature of phenomena is shown to be the heart essence, free of conceptual elaboration.üîΩCHAPTER EIGHTY

original: mi sgrib pa'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: mi sgrib pa'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o ////
translated: The Transcendent State That Is Spontaneously Present and Beyond Hope and Fear

original: @116b de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lhun grub re dogs las 'das pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: @116b de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lhun grub re dogs las 'das pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating sovereign, mind of enlightenment, gave the following teaching on the transcendent state that is spontaneously present and beyond hope and fear:üîΩKye!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
translated: Bodhisattva Vajra, listen properly now!

original: da ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: da ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: Now I am the teacher, the all-creating monarch.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa //
translated: All phenomena, however they appear,

original: skye med sems kyi rang bzhin nyid du bstan //
analyzed: skye med sems kyi rang bzhin nyid du bstan //
translated: are shown to be the unborn nature of mind.üîΩKye!

original: kye / sems kyi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kye / sems kyi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the nature of mind is spontaneously present,

original: grub dang ma grub gnyis su lung mi ston //
analyzed: grub dang ma grub gnyis su lung mi ston //
translated: no prediction is made concerning whether or not it is accomplished.

original: bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis su rtog mi byed //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis su rtog mi byed //
translated: Do not think in terms of happiness and suffering.

original: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par re dogs bral //
analyzed: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par re dogs bral //
translated: Be free of hope and fear concerning samsara and nirvana.

original: lhun grub sems kyi rang bzhin cir snang bas //
analyzed: lhun grub sems kyi rang bzhin cir snang bas //
translated: The nature of spontaneously present mind manifests in any way whatsoever.üîΩ

original: ma byung stong pa'i don du smra ma byed //
analyzed: ma byung stong pa'i don du smra ma byed //
translated: Do not speak of the meaning of emptiness as being unarisen,üîΩbecause the nature of spontaneously present mind appears as anything at all.

original: gzhi rtsa snying po rtog dpyod las 'das pas //
analyzed: gzhi rtsa snying po rtog dpyod las 'das pas //
translated: Since the ground of being, the heart essence, is beyond imagination and scrutiny,

original: grub cing brtan pa'i phyogs su zhen mi byed //
analyzed: grub cing brtan pa'i phyogs su zhen mi byed //
translated: do not fixate on some position of attainment or stability.

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
translated: O Se≈à¬≠dharma, contemplate well!

original: lhun grub rtog dpyod 'das pa'i snying po la //
analyzed: lhun grub rtog dpyod 'das pa'i snying po la //
translated: In the heart essence, which is spontaneously present and beyond imagination and scrutiny,

original: grub dang ma grub don la rtog mi byed //
analyzed: grub dang ma grub don la rtog mi byed //
translated: do not speculate about what is or is not the case concerning attainment.

original: de phyir khyod kyang rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: de phyir khyod kyang rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Therefore, do not indulge in concepts.

original: kye / lhun grub bya rtsol 'das pa'i snying po la //
analyzed: kye / lhun grub bya rtsol 'das pa'i snying po la //
translated: O heart essence, which is spontaneously present and beyond concerted effort,

original: gang gi phyogs ldog med pa'i zhen pa ni //
analyzed: gang gi phyogs ldog med pa'i zhen pa ni //
translated: there is no fixation on any extreme to be refuted.

original: ji ltar bus pa mkha' la rtsod pa ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar bus pa mkha' la rtsod pa ltar //
translated: Those who argue about space are like children.

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: They will not perceive my nature, that of the allcreating one.

original: gang gis gang spangs ldog par 'dod pa ni //
analyzed: gang gis gang spangs ldog par 'dod pa ni //
translated: Those who reject one thing and affirm another

original: re dogs 'jigs pa'i sems dang ma bral bas //
analyzed: re dogs 'jigs pa'i sems dang ma bral bas //
translated: are not free of the mind that is fearful of hope and of fear.

original: mtha' bral mtha' la zhen pa'i gang zag gis //
analyzed: mtha' bral mtha' la zhen pa'i gang zag gis //
translated: Individuals who are attached to extremes,

original: lhun grub snying po'i don la ji ltar reg /
analyzed: lhun grub snying po'i don la ji ltar reg /
translated: How can one touch the ultimate meaning of spontaneous presence?

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms @117a *//
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms @117a *//
translated: O great and courageous one, contemplate this well!

original: shig / ma skyes rnam par dag pa'i don snang bas //
analyzed: shig / ma skyes rnam par dag pa'i don snang bas //
translated: The meaning of the unborn and pure appearance of things

original: snang ba dngos por mi lta 'jig mi byed //
analyzed: snang ba dngos por mi lta 'jig mi byed //
translated: is not to be regarded as an entity, nor is it to be destroyed.

original: snang ba skye ba med par rang grol bas //
analyzed: snang ba skye ba med par rang grol bas //
translated: Since apparent phenomena are naturally free in the unborn state,

original: stong pa mi sgom ji bzhin rtogs pas grol //
analyzed: stong pa mi sgom ji bzhin rtogs pas grol //
translated: emptiness is not cultivated, and so one is free through realization of the nature of things just as it is.üîΩO great and courageous one, listen!

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
translated: I, the all-creating monarch‚Äîthe teacher of teachers‚Äî

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kun //
translated: have proclaimed that all phenomena, however they appear,

original: ma skyes rnam par dag par lung bstan pas //
analyzed: ma skyes rnam par dag par lung bstan pas //
translated: are unborn and pure.

original: ji ltar skye ba med pa nyid du rtogs //
analyzed: ji ltar skye ba med pa nyid du rtogs //
translated: How is it that they are realized to be unborn?

original: kye / nga las byung ba ston pa sku gsum la //
analyzed: kye / nga las byung ba ston pa sku gsum la //
translated: O great and courageous one, the three teachers who come from me

original: sems nyid skye ba med par kun smra zhing //
analyzed: sems nyid skye ba med par kun smra zhing //
translated: all speak of the unborn nature of mind,

original: rang bzhin med pa'i don la kun rtsod kyang //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i don la kun rtsod kyang //
translated: and all dispute the meaning of the absence of any independent nature,

original: skye med mngon sum dus kyis rtogs pa med //
analyzed: skye med mngon sum dus kyis rtogs pa med //
translated: yet they do not realize the immediacy of the unborn state.

original: de phyir kun byed rgyal po'i lung 'di la //
analyzed: de phyir kun byed rgyal po'i lung 'di la //
translated: Therefore, having understood this transmission of the all-creating monarch,

original: shes nas ma yengs don la gnas pa las //
analyzed: shes nas ma yengs don la gnas pa las //
translated: abide in the undistracted state of ultimate reality.

original: rtsol bas mi 'jug gnyen pos sems mi sbyongs //
analyzed: rtsol bas mi 'jug gnyen pos sems mi sbyongs //
translated: Do not engage in effort, do not purify the mind with antidotes,

original: yul la mi 'jog dran pa'i sems mi sdud //
analyzed: yul la mi 'jog dran pa'i sems mi sdud //
translated: Do not focus on objects, and do not gather the mind with mindfulness.

original: gang ltar 'byung ba de nyid don yin pas //
analyzed: gang ltar 'byung ba de nyid don yin pas //
translated: Whatever occurs is itself the point,

original: kun byed nga yi don la 'jug par gyis //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi don la 'jug par gyis //
translated: So engage in the meaning of me, the all-creating one.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: O teacher of teachers, all-creating monarch,

original: ma bcos sems kyi 'khor la lung phog pa //
analyzed: ma bcos sems kyi 'khor la lung phog pa //
translated: The transmission is imparted to the retinue of the uncontrived mind.

original: ma lus skye med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: ma lus skye med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Yogin who has realized the unborn nature in all its extent,

original: rang bzhin bcu las rtsol bar ma byed cig /
analyzed: rang bzhin bcu las rtsol bar ma byed cig /
translated: Do not strive in the ten attributes.

original: kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la //
translated: In the nature of all-creating awakened mind,

original: shes pas gzung 'dzin mi shes spang med pas //
analyzed: shes pas gzung 'dzin mi shes spang med pas //
translated: There is no ignorance to be abandoned through knowledge of the object and subject.

original: rtogs pa dbang bsgyur don la gnas pa yis //
analyzed: rtogs pa dbang bsgyur don la gnas pa yis //
translated: Those who realize this and abide in the ultimate meaning, in which realization is mastery,

original: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs @117b pa lhun gyis grub /
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs @117b pa lhun gyis grub /
translated: Spontaneously experience the enlightened intent of the all-creating monarch.üîΩThis is the eighty-first chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the spontaneous presence in which hope and fear are eliminated.üîΩCHAPTER 82üîΩThe Explanation of the Nature of MindüîΩ Translation: Do not engage in effort, do not purify the mind with antidotes,üîΩDo not focus on objects, and do not gather the mind with mindfulness.üîΩWhatever occurs is itself the point,üîΩSo engage in the meaning of me, the all-creating one.üîΩO teacher of teachers, all-creating monarch,üîΩThe transmission is imparted to the retinue of the uncontrived mind.üîΩYogin who has realized the unborn nature in all its extent,

original: ces gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Do not strive in the ten attributes.üîΩIn the nature of all-creating awakened mind,üîΩThere is no ignorance to be abandoned through knowledge of the object and subject.üîΩThose who realize this and abide in the ultimate meaning, in which realization is mastery,üîΩSpontaneously experience the enlightened intent of the all-creating monarch.üîΩThis is the eighty-first chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the spontaneous presence in which hope and fear are eliminated.üîΩCHAPTER 82

original: lhun grub re dogs bcad pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o ////
analyzed: lhun grub re dogs bcad pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o ////
translated: The Explanation of the Nature of Mind

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so //
translated: Then Bodhisattva Vajra of Mind made this request to the All-Creating King:üîΩKye!

original: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags /
analyzed: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags /
translated: All-Creating Teacher, King,

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni khyod kyis byas //
translated: the phenomena that appear in all their variety are created by you.

original: bstan pa'i dam chos ma lus khyod kyis bkod //
analyzed: bstan pa'i dam chos ma lus khyod kyis bkod //
translated: All the sacred teachings of the Dharma are arranged by you.

original: dam pa'i rang bzhin khyod kyis bstan pas na //
analyzed: dam pa'i rang bzhin khyod kyis bstan pas na //
translated: The nature of the sacred is revealed by you.

original: khyod kyi rang bzhin rtogs na chos kun rtogs //
analyzed: khyod kyi rang bzhin rtogs na chos kun rtogs //
translated: If you realize the nature of the All-Creating One, you realize all phenomena.

original: de bas chos kun nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di //
analyzed: de bas chos kun nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di //
translated: Therefore, the nature of all phenomena is this:

original: 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsal bar ma rig pas //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsal bar ma rig pas //
translated: The assembled retinue is not aware of this.

original: don du ji ltar gnas pa bshad du gsol /
analyzed: don du ji ltar gnas pa bshad du gsol /
translated: Please explain how things abide in actuality.

original: zhes zhus so //
analyzed: zhes zhus so //
translated: This was his request.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mdo lung rgyud la bsdu ba 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mdo lung rgyud la bsdu ba 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the All-Creating King, Bodhichitta, spoke this summary of the sutras and tantras:üîΩKye!

original: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis //
translated: Bodhisattva Vajra, listen well!

original: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: The Teacher, the All-Creating King,

original: 'khor la mdo lung bsdus pa 'di phog pa //
analyzed: 'khor la mdo lung bsdus pa 'di phog pa //
translated: has given this summary of the sutras to the retinue.

original: legs par bstan pa'i don la nan tan gyis //
analyzed: legs par bstan pa'i don la nan tan gyis //
translated: And apply themselves to the meaning of the teachings well given,üîΩ

original: kye / nga yi rang bzhin skye med don gcig la //
analyzed: kye / nga yi rang bzhin skye med don gcig la //
translated: Oh! In the single meaning of my unborn nature,

original: rgyud kyi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum du bstan //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum du bstan //
translated: the nature of the tantra is explained in three aspects.

original: gdams pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim pa yis //
analyzed: gdams pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim pa yis //
translated: By the stages of the three kinds of instructions,üîΩthe tantra is completely explained with the root tantra, the latter,

original: rgyud ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma dang; ;phyi ma'i phyi mas don rdzogs bstan pa yin //
analyzed: rgyud ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma dang; ;phyi ma'i phyi mas don rdzogs bstan pa yin //
translated: and the latter of the latter.

original: kye / rtsa ba thos pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
analyzed: kye / rtsa ba thos pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
translated: Oh! The teaching on the nature of the root is

original: nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyis //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyis //
translated: my nature with fifty-seven [sections],

original: dngos po'i don kun gtan la phab @118a *//
analyzed: dngos po'i don kun gtan la phab @118a *//
translated: which ascertains all the meanings of entities.

original: pa ste // sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par nan tan gyis //
analyzed: pa ste // sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par nan tan gyis //
translated: Be diligent, O spiritual warrior Vajra!

original: kye / nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun ni //
analyzed: kye / nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun ni //
translated: Oh! My nature with fifty-seven

original: mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu po dang // nges par bstan pa'i mad lung bcu po dang // rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang // bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang // gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bcu dag dang //
analyzed: mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu po dang // nges par bstan pa'i mad lung bcu po dang // rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang // bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang // gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bcu dag dang //
translated: and the ten sutras that bring certainty.

original: dgos ched so sor bstan pas lnga bcu lnga //
analyzed: dgos ched so sor bstan pas lnga bcu lnga //
translated: These are the fifty sutras that are taught for the sake of individual purposes.

original: gcig gis gzhi bstan gcig gis gdams pa bstan //
analyzed: gcig gis gzhi bstan gcig gis gdams pa bstan //
translated: One teaches the ground, and one teaches the instructions.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: O! The teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa //
analyzed: mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa //
translated: has taught the ten sutras that reveal.

original: dang po dang ni bcu dang gnyis bstan pa //
analyzed: dang po dang ni bcu dang gnyis bstan pa //
translated: The first, the tenth, and the twelfth are taught.

original: bcu gcig pa dang gsum dang nyi shu pa //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa dang gsum dang nyi shu pa //
translated: The eleventh, the third, and the twentieth,üîΩthe fifteenth, the twenty-fifth,

original: bco lnga pa dang nyi shu lnga pa dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig drug pas rdzogs pa yin //
analyzed: bco lnga pa dang nyi shu lnga pa dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig drug pas rdzogs pa yin //
translated: and the twenty-first are perfected by the sixth.

original: gdams ngag phog pas mngon phyung mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gdams ngag phog pas mngon phyung mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because the instructions are imparted, the revelation is seen.

original: bcu drug pa yis mngon phyung dgos pa bstan //
analyzed: bcu drug pa yis mngon phyung dgos pa bstan //
translated: Therefore, the sixteenth teaches the purpose of the revelation.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ah! The teacher of teachers, the All-Creating King,

original: nges par bstan pa'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa //
analyzed: nges par bstan pa'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa //
translated: teaches ten sutras that reveal certainty.

original: bzhi pa sum cu gsum pa bcu gsum pa //
analyzed: bzhi pa sum cu gsum pa bcu gsum pa //
translated: The forty-third, the thirteenth,

original: bcu gnyis pa dang lnga dang sum cu gnyis //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa dang lnga dang sum cu gnyis //
translated: the twelfth, the fifth, and the thirty-second,üîΩthe thirty-sixth, the thirty-fourth,

original: sum cu drug dang sum cu bzhi pa dang // nyi shu dgu dang bcu bdun pa yis rdzogs //
analyzed: sum cu drug dang sum cu bzhi pa dang // nyi shu dgu dang bcu bdun pa yis rdzogs //
translated: the twenty-ninth, and the seventeenth are complete.

original: nges par bstan pa'i dgos pa yid ches dag /
analyzed: nges par bstan pa'i dgos pa yid ches dag /
translated: The purpose of revealing certainty is to inspire confidence.

original: lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa yis bstan pa yin //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa yis bstan pa yin //
translated: This is taught in the fifty-fifth.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ah! The teacher of teachers, the All-Creating King,

original: rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo @118b lung bcu bstan pa //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo @118b lung bcu bstan pa //
translated: teaches ten sutras that transcend cause and effect.

original: bzhi bcu gcig pa bcu bzhi sum cu brgyad //
analyzed: bzhi bcu gcig pa bcu bzhi sum cu brgyad //
translated: The forty-first, the fourteenth, the thirty-eighth,

original: dgu pa dang ni so lnga bcu dgu pa //
analyzed: dgu pa dang ni so lnga bcu dgu pa //
translated: the ninth, the thirty-fifth, and the forty-ninth,üîΩthe eighteenth, the eighth, the fortieth,

original: bco brgyad pa dang brgyad dang bzhi bcu dang // lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa yis bstan pa yin //
analyzed: bco brgyad pa dang brgyad dang bzhi bcu dang // lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa yis bstan pa yin //
translated: and the fifty-second teach this.

original: rgyu 'bras 'das pas rtsol bsgrub bya mi dgos //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras 'das pas rtsol bsgrub bya mi dgos //
translated: Since cause and effect are transcended, effort and achievement are unnecessary.

original: bdun pa nyid du nges par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: bdun pa nyid du nges par bstan pa yin //
translated: This is revealed to be the seventh.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ah! The teacher of teachers, the All-Creating King,

original: bya med rdzogs pa'i lung bcu bstan pa ni //
analyzed: bya med rdzogs pa'i lung bcu bstan pa ni //
translated: has revealed ten transmissions of perfection without action:üîΩthe twenty-second, the thirtieth,

original: nyi shu gnyis dang sum cu pa dag dang // nyi shu bzhi dang nyer brgyad nyi shu bdun //
analyzed: nyi shu gnyis dang sum cu pa dag dang // nyi shu bzhi dang nyer brgyad nyi shu bdun //
translated: the twenty-fourth, the twenty-eighth, and the twenty-seventh,

original: sum cu gcig dang nyer gsum nyi shu drug /
analyzed: sum cu gcig dang nyer gsum nyi shu drug /
translated: the thirty-first, the twenty-third, and the twenty-sixth,

original: zhe bzhi lnga bcu drug pas bstan pa yin //
analyzed: zhe bzhi lnga bcu drug pas bstan pa yin //
translated: the forty-fourth, the fiftieth, and the fifty-sixth.

original: ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to reveal the uncontrived nature as perfect,

original: bzhi bcu gsum pas de yi dgos pa bstan //
analyzed: bzhi bcu gsum pas de yi dgos pa bstan //
translated: the forty-third transmission reveals its purpose.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ah! The teacher of teachers, the All-Creating King,

original: gtan la 'bebs pa'i lung bcu bstan pa ni //
analyzed: gtan la 'bebs pa'i lung bcu bstan pa ni //
translated: has revealed ten transmissions of confirmation:üîΩthe twenty-eighth, the twenty-ninth,

original: nyer brgyad pa dang sum cu dgu pa dang // bzhi bcu lnga dang so bdun zhe drug pa //
analyzed: nyer brgyad pa dang sum cu dgu pa dang // bzhi bcu lnga dang so bdun zhe drug pa //
translated: the forty-fifth, the thirty-seventh, the forty-sixth,

original: zhe bdun pa dang zhe dgu nga gcig pa //
analyzed: zhe bdun pa dang zhe dgu nga gcig pa //
translated: the forty-seventh, the forty-ninth, the fifty-first,

original: lnga bcu pa dang lnga bcu gsum pas rdzogs //
analyzed: lnga bcu pa dang lnga bcu gsum pas rdzogs //
translated: the fiftieth, and the fifty-third.

original: gtan la phebs na ma bcos bcos med pas //
analyzed: gtan la phebs na ma bcos bcos med pas //
translated: Since there is no contrivance or fabrication in confirmation,

original: bzhi bcu gnyis pas dgos pa bstan pa yin //
analyzed: bzhi bcu gnyis pas dgos pa bstan pa yin //
translated: the forty-second transmission reveals its purpose.

original: lnga bcu bzhi pas rtsa ba'i gzhi bstan nas //
analyzed: lnga bcu bzhi pas rtsa ba'i gzhi bstan nas //
translated: The fifty-fourth chapter explains the fundamental ground,

original: lnga bcu bdun pas gtad cing gdams pa ste //
analyzed: lnga bcu bdun pas gtad cing gdams pa ste //
translated: and the fifty-seventh chapter entrusts and imparts the transmission.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud de thos par gces pa yin //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud de thos par gces pa yin //
translated: It is crucial to listen to this root tantra.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po des //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po des //
translated: O! The teacher of teachers, the all-creating king,

original: bsam pas gtan la phab ste bstan pa ni //
analyzed: bsam pas gtan la phab ste bstan pa ni //
translated: having ascertained the meaning through reflection, taught

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i don rnams @119a *//üîΩkyang // rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin bcu ru bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i don rnams @119a *// kyang // rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin bcu ru bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: the meaning that is stated in the root tantraüîΩin order to reveal the perfect nature in ten aspects.

original: rtogs pa'i mdo lung bcu ru bstan pa yin //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i mdo lung bcu ru bstan pa yin //
translated: Therefore, the S≈´tra of Realization is revealed in ten topics.
